In addition, this spell automatically attempts to counteract any @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} cast by a devil within the area or cast by a devil attempting to enter the area using dimension door. If a devil attempts to enter the area using dimension door and the spell is counteracted, the devil remains where it started.

entries.name: 拟像术 Simulacrum
entries.description:
描述 你通过活化冰雪并雕塑其表面创造出一个目标生物的幻象复制品。拟像是无特殊能力的4级生物。若它需要尝试检定或使用DC，除了后文所述的部分之外，需要取用怪物的适中数值（moderate number for a monster；见Gamemastery Guide 57页）。拟像没有来自目标的任何特定记忆，但是它能使用任何施法者提供的关于目标生物的信息，并用此来模仿目标。拟像看起来与目标一样，并且在模仿目标生物时具有欺骗调整值，该调整值与次要施法者中投掷欺骗检定的人相同，并额外+4点状态加值。

尽管拟像不具有任何目标的原始特殊能力，比如龙的喷吐武器，但是构成拟像的幻象允许它显得好像能使用这些能力一般；只是这些效果似乎永远无法产生实质效果。举例说明，在对抗拟像龙的喷吐武器时，所有区域内的生物看起来都好像在豁免检定中掷出大成功并且不受任何伤害。生物可以进行一次察觉检定对抗次要施法者中投掷欺骗检定的人的欺骗DC，用于尝试不相信幻觉。

大成功 你为拟像赋予了生命。它具有仆从（Minion）特征并且处于你的绝对控制之下。你与拟像会获得直接的精神联系（direct mental link），并且能够通过这种联系来花费1个动作指挥拟像，即便你与他相隔一段距离。

成功 同大成功，但是你与拟像之间没有特殊的联系。你必须花费1个动作来用口头或其他方式来指挥拟像。

失败 仪式失败并且没有任何效果。

大失败 拟像苏醒了，但它不是你的仆从，而且对所有施法者都是敌对态度。它会尽其所能来摧毁施法者，但如果无法立即杀死他们，则会尝试逃脱并计划谋害施法者。

entries.name: 睡眠术 SLEEP
entries.description:
区域中的每个生物昏昏欲睡。

由于该法术失去意识的生物不会倒地，也不会松开其持握的东西。该法术不会令生物无法通过觉察醒来，并因此限制其在战斗中的能力。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物在觉察检定上承受-1状态罚值，持续1轮。

失败 该生物失去意识。如果它在1分钟后仍然失去意识，它自动醒来。

大失败 该生物失去意识。如果它在1小时候仍然失去意识，它自动醒来。

升阶（4环级） 目标在失败时失去意识1轮，在大失败时失去意识1分钟。它们会倒地，并松开其持握的东西，并且他们无法尝试觉察检定以醒来。当持续时间结束时，该生物会正常睡着，而不是自动醒来。

entries.name: 蜕皮术
entries.description:
You continually and harmlessly slough off the top layer of your skin while new skin regenerates immediately, quickly moving damaging substances away from your body. The flat check to remove @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} from effects that coat your skin (such as most persistent acid damage) is reduced to 5, and you gain a +2 status bonus to your initial save against contact poison (but not to further saves, since by that point, the toxin has already entered your system). If you're suffering from an effect other than Persistent Damage that depends on continuous contact with your skin, if that effect allows a saving throw, you receive a new saving throw against that effect at the end of each turn when you attempt your flat checks against Persistent Damage, and you also receive a +2 status bonus to those saving throws.

While affected by this spell, your continually shedding skin makes you much easier to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track}. Anyone Tracking you gains a +2 circumstance bonus to do so, and you cannot Hide Your Tracks.

entries.name: 缓慢术 SLOW
entries.description:
你令目标周围的时间膨胀，令其行动缓慢。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标获得缓慢1，持续1轮。

失败 目标获得缓慢1，持续1分钟。

大失败 目标获得缓慢2，持续1分钟。

升阶（6环级） 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

entries.name: Snare Hopping
entries.description:
You may not have placed your snare in the right place, but you can magically move it there. You teleport the target snare to another unoccupied location in range.

Heightened (+1) The range of the spell increases by 10 feet.

entries.name: Snowball
entries.description:
You throw a magically propelled and chilled ball of dense snow. The target takes 2d4 cold damage and potentially other effects, depending on the result of your spell attack roll.

Critical Success The target takes double damage and a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Success The target takes full damage and a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Failure No effect.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4.

entries.name: 重雾术 SOLID FOG
entries.description:
你创造一团浓密到足以阻碍移动和视力的雾气团。

这如同隐雾术（obscuring mist）（见355页）一般，除了该区域也会成为困难地形。你可以解消该法术。

entries.name: Song of Marching
entries.description:
You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move. You and your allies in the area can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Hustle} for the spell's duration, even though you are also @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustaining the Spell}. You and your allies then become temporarily immune for 1 day.

Heightened (6th) You can Sustain the Spell for up to 2 hours.

Heightened (9th) You can Sustain the Spell for up to 4 hours.

entries.name: Song of Strength
entries.description:
You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Inspire Heroics} composition spell, you can use that composition to improve the bonus granted by song of strength in the same way as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Inspire Courage} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Inspire Defense}.

entries.name: Song of the Fallen
entries.description:
You chant a dirge or an elegy that either rouses the dead to action or reminds undead that they should lay to rest.

If you target dead creatures, the bodies animate and can continue acting as if they were alive. A creature animated in this way has 60 temporary Hit Points. The animated creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} 1 but can otherwise act normally. Creatures animated with this spell die again once the spell ends.

If you target undead creatures, each undead must attempt a basic Will save.

Critical Success The undead takes 5d6 positive damage.

Success The undead takes 10d6 positive damage and is Slowed 1 for 1 round.

Failure The undead takes 100 positive damage and is Slowed 1 for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The undead is destroyed.

entries.name: 安抚术 SOOTHE
entries.description:
你安抚目标的精神，增强其精神防御并治愈其伤口。

目标在你施放该法术时，回复1d10+4生命值，并且在持续时间中，目标对抗心灵效果的豁免上获得+2状态加值。

升阶（+1） 该治疗量增加1d10+4。

entries.name: Soothing Ballad
entries.description:
You draw upon your muse to soothe your allies. Choose one of the following three effects:

  • The spell attempts to counteract fear effects on the targets.
  • The spell attempts to counteract effects imposing paralysis on the targets.
  • The spell restores 7d8 Hit Points to the targets.

Heightened (+1) When used to heal, soothing ballad restores 1d8 more Hit Points.

entries.name: Soothing Mist
entries.description:
You call forth a magical mist of positive energy that envelops a creature. The mist restores [[/r 2d8]] Hit Points to a target living creature and ends one source of persistent acid, bleed, fire, negative, or poison damage affecting it. If the creature is taking persistent damage from multiple sources, you select which one is removed. Against an undead target, you deal [[/r 2d8 #positive]] positive damage (basic Fortitude save); if it fails the save, it also takes [[/r 2 #persistent positive]] persistent positive damage.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing (or damage to an undead target) increases by [[/r 1d8]], and the persistent positive damage to an undead creature increases by [[/r 1]].

entries.name: Soothing Words
entries.description:
You attempt to calm the target by uttering soothing words in a calm and even tone. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 against emotion effects.

In addition, when you Cast this Spell, you can attempt to counteract one emotion effect on the target.

Heightened (5th) The bonus to saves increases to +2, or +3 against emotion effects.

entries.name: Soul Siphon
entries.description:
You siphon off a portion of the target's soul to bolster your
own vitality. The target must attempt a Fortitude save or take [[/r 1d4 #negative]] negative damage. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the total amount of HP the target loses, including the HP lost from becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and becomes
Drained 1.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and
becomes Drained 2.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by [[/r 1d4 #negative]].

entries.name: 音鸣爆 SOUND BURST
entries.description:
刺耳的噪音迸裂而出。

造成2d10音波伤害。每个生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且耳聋1轮。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，获得耳聋1分钟，并且震慑1。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加1d10。

entries.name: 动物交谈 SPEAK WITH ANIMALS
entries.description:
你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答。

你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

entries.name: 植物交谈 SPEAK WITH PLANTS
entries.description:
你可以对植物提出问题，从植物获得回答。

该法术不会令植物比正常更为友好或者比正常更有智慧。大多数通常植物对周围的世界仅有直觉的认识，所以它们无法认出生物的细节，或者了解任何其周围环境以外的世界。聪明的植物怪物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

entries.name: Speaking Sky
entries.description: The air speaks to you. You can precisely sense any motion within 60 feet through vibration and air movement.

entries.name: 幽灵手 SPECTRAL HAND
entries.description:
你利用自身生命力创造出一个半实体的手，它能为你传递接触法术。

当你施放一个具有接触射程的法术时，你可以令这只手沿着地面爬行到射程中的一个目标，接触该目标，然后爬回到你这里。当你通过这只手尝试一次近战法术攻击时，你使用你通常的加值。该手可以在射程内移动任意远。该手具有你的AC和豁免，但是任何对这只手的伤害会将其摧毁，并对你造成1d6伤害。

entries.name: 法术免疫 SPELL IMMUNITY
entries.description:
你保护目标免受一个法术的效果影响。

选择一个法术，作为语言成分的一部分大声念出其名称。每当法术免疫的目标成为所念出名字的法术的目标或者处于该法术的区域内时，法术免疫会尝试反制该法术。通过法术免疫成功反制以区域为目标或者具有数个目标的法术时，仅取消对法术免疫所影响的目标的效果。

entries.name: 法术反转 SPELL TURNING
entries.description:
该防护法术会将对你施放的法术反射给其施法者。

当一个法术指定你为目标时，你可以花费一个反应动作来尝试反射它。此处使用反制该法术的规则，但如果该法术成功被反制，该法术会反射给施法者。无论反制尝试是否成功，法术反转在那之后结束。法术反转无法影响没有目标的法术（例如区域法术）。如果法术反转反射了一个同样处于法术反转影响下的施法者，其法术反转亦可以尝试将它自己的法术再反射给你；如果它们如此做，其反制检定自动成功。

entries.name: Spellmaster's Ward
entries.description:
Duration sustained up to 1 minute

You create one or more glowing protective runes that revolve around you. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of runes you create by one, to a maximum of three runes for 3 actions.

When you next take damage from a spell, a rune is expended to prevent 2d6 of that spell's damage. If damage from the triggering spell remains, additional runes are expended until the damage is completely negated, or until all runes have been spent, whichever comes first.

Heightened (+1) Each rune prevents an additional 1 damage.

entries.name: 法力迸裂 SPELLWRACK
entries.description:
你令对目标施放的法术泄露出伤害性的能量涌动。

目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 每当目标被具有持续时间的法术影响时，该目标承受2d12持续力场伤害。每当其从法力迸裂承受力场伤害时，它减少影响其的法术持续时间1轮。仅有通过一次对抗你的法术DC的奥法（Arcana）检定才能领目标从该持续伤害中恢复；该诅咒和持续伤害在1分钟之后结束。

失败 如同成功，但是该诅咒和持续伤害不会自己结束。

大失败 如同失败，但是持续力场伤害为4d12。

entries.name: 蛛行术 SPIDER CLIMB
entries.description:
该生物的手与脚上长出粘附性的细毛，能在几乎任何表面上提供附着力。

目标获得等于其速度的攀爬速度。

升阶（5环级） 该持续时间增加到1小时。

entries.name: 蛛咬术 SPIDER STING
entries.description:
你使用魔法重现了蜘蛛的剧毒叮咬。

你对接触到的生物造成1d4穿刺伤害，并且令其感染蜘蛛毒。目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受1d4毒素伤害。

失败 目标感染蜘蛛毒并到达阶段1。

大失败 目标感染蜘蛛毒并到达阶段2。

蜘蛛毒（毒素）；等级 1；最大持续时间 4轮。阶段1 1d4毒素伤害并且衰竭1（1轮）；阶段2 1d4毒素伤害并且衰竭2（1轮）。

entries.name: 刺石术 SPIKE STONES
entries.description:
长而尖锐的岩石尖刺从区域中的地面迸出。

该区域变为困难地形和危险地形。在地面上移动穿过该区域的生物，每进入该区域中的一个方格，承受3穿刺伤害。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加1。

entries.name: 灵魂冲击 SPIRIT BLAST
entries.description:
你集中以太能量，攻击目标的灵魂。

造成16d6力场伤害。由于灵魂冲击影响该生物的灵魂，它可以伤害投射其意识的目标（例如通过投影术（project image））或者占据其他生物的目标，即使该目标的躯体在其他地方。该被占据的生物不会被该冲击伤害。该冲击不会伤害没有灵魂的生物，例如构装体。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加2d6。

entries.name: 灵魂链接 SPIRIT LINK
entries.description:
你和其他生物建立了一条灵魂链接，令你代为承受其苦痛。

当你施放该法术，以及在你回合开始时，如果目标生命值低于其最大生命值，它回复2生命值（或者其当前生命值和最大生命值的差值，如果这更低）。你失去等于目标回复量的生命值。

这是一种基于灵魂的转移，所以没有任何效果会增加目标获得的生命值或者减少你失去的生命值。这种转移也会忽略你或者目标所拥有的任何临时生命值。由于该效果中没有任何正能量或者负能量作用，灵魂链接在你或者目标为不死生物时也生效。在持续时间中，你不会从再生或者快速治疗中受益。你可以解消该法术，并且一旦你为0生命值，灵魂链接自动结束。

升阶（+1） 每次转移的生命值增加2。

entries.name: Spirit Object
entries.description:
Using a sliver of Baba Yaga's power, you briefly bring an object to life. The object gains a means of locomotion, such as sprouting chicken legs, and Strides up to 25 feet to a space you decide within range. If you spent 2 actions Casting the Spell, the object then attacks one creature of your choice adjacent to its new space. Make a melee spell attack roll against the creature. On a success, the creature takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (as appropriate for the object) equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier, and on a critical success, it takes double damage.

Heightened (+1) Increase the maximum Bulk of the target by 1 and the damage by 1d4.

entries.name: 精魂感知 SPIRIT SENSE
entries.description:
你向玄妙的世界打开心灵，令你能够感受到附近的精魂。

即使你没有在搜索（Search），你也会获得一个检定来发现区域中的作祟（haunts）和精魂（spirits）。你在关于作祟和精魂的后续检定上获得+1状态加值：用以搜索（Seek）的察觉（Perception）检定，尝试回忆知识（Recall Knowledge），判断其存在原因的技能检定，解除作祟的技能检定。你在对抗作祟和精魂的AC和豁免骰上也会获得+1状态加值。

升阶（6环级） 该法术持续时间为直到下次你进行你的每日准备。

entries.name: 灵魂挽歌 SPIRIT SONG
entries.description:
你诡异的歌声释放出以太能量构成的脉冲，攻击区域中生物的灵魂。

造成18d6力场伤害。由于灵魂挽歌影响该生物的灵魂，它可以伤害投射其意识的目标（例如通过投影术（project image））或者占据其他生物的目标，即使该目标的躯体在其他地方。灵魂挽歌的震撼波会穿过固体障碍，但不会穿透，因而会伤害躲在区域内固体物体中的虚体生物，但不会继续穿透伤害对面房间的生物。被占据的生物不会被歌声伤害。该歌声不会伤害没有灵魂的生物，例如构装体。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加2d6。

entries.name: Spirit Veil
entries.description:
You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from undead eyes. You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to all creatures, and you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from undead creatures regardless of what precise senses they have; this grants the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, but against all the undead creature's precise senses. If you physically @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with an undead creature or use a hostile action, the spell ends.

Heightened (+1) You can target one additional willing creature within 30 feet. The spell ends if any target physically Interacts with an undead creature or uses a hostile action.

entries.name: Spiritual Anamnesis
entries.description:
Memories of a past life that seem incredibly real (and may even be) overwhelm the target's mind. This is especially disorienting for undead and creatures that have lived a previous life (such as celestials, fiends, monitors, and many other extraplanar creatures); if such creatures roll a critical success on their save, they get a success instead, and if they roll a failure, they get a critical failure instead.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} 1 for 1 round.

Failure The target is Slowed 1 for 1 minute and babbles about the visions, possibly providing information about what they saw.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} 3.

entries.name: 灵魂灾疫 SPIRITUAL EPIDEMIC
entries.description:
你诅咒目标，毁坏其灵魂，并在其生命中留下感染性的陷阱。

目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。当任何生物对被灵魂灾疫影响的目标释放神术或者异能法术时，必须也尝试一次意志豁免。该诅咒会如此继续传播。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标获得衰竭2和呆滞2，持续1轮。

失败 目标获得衰竭2和呆滞2，持续1分钟，然后获得衰竭1和呆滞1，持续永久。

大失败 目标获得衰竭3和呆滞3，持续1分钟，然后获得衰竭2和呆滞2，持续永久。

entries.name: 灵能守卫 SPIRITUAL GUARDIAN
entries.description:
一位由魔法力量构成的中型守卫攻击现身，并攻击你指定的射程内的敌人。

灵能守卫是半透明的，并且看起来正持握你的神祇的偏好武器。

当施放该法术时，灵能守卫会出现在与你选择的在射程内的敌人所相邻的未被占据空间，并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。每当你维持该法术时，你可以将灵能守卫移动到射程内一个目标相邻的空间（如果需要）并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。该守卫使用你的多次攻击罚值，并且计入你的多次攻击罚值。另外，当你维持该法术时，你可以令该守卫移动到一个盟友旁边并保护该盟友。你如此做时，每当该盟友将承受伤害，该守卫会代替你的盟友承受最初10点伤害。直到你移动该守卫来攻击敌人或者保护一个不同的盟友，或者直到守卫被摧毁（它具有50生命值，并且无法被任何方式回复生命值），它会一直保护该盟友。除了在保护一个盟友时，该守卫无法通常地承受伤害，但解离术会在命中灵能守卫（AC为25）时自动摧毁它。

守卫的打击（Strike）是近战法术攻击。无论守卫的武器外形如何，该守卫造成等于2d8加上你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害，但你也能改为造成其持握的武器通常所造成类型的伤害，而不是力场伤害。武器的其他特征和数据不会生效，远程武器也只能攻击相邻的生物。除了进行的是法术攻击，灵能守卫的武器对于触发条件，抗力和其他能力而言是一件武器。

该守卫会占据空间，并且盟友能利用其来造成夹击，但它相比正常生物而言，除了生命值没有其他任何特性，并且生物能够穿过其占据空间不受阻碍。除了其打击（Strike）以外，该守卫不能尝试其他任何攻击，并且影响武器或者增强盟友的专长或者法术对守卫无效。

升阶（+2） 守卫的伤害增加1d8，生命值增加20。

entries.name: 灵能武器 SPIRITUAL WEAPON
entries.description:
由纯粹的魔法力量构成的武器出现，并攻击你指定的射程内的敌人。

该武器看起来若隐若现，并且展现为你的神祇的偏好武器的形态。

当施放该法术时，该武器会出现在与你选择的在射程内的敌人所相邻的未被占据空间，并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。每当你维持该法术时，你可以将该武器移动到射程内一个新的目标（如果需要）并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。该灵能武器使用你的多次攻击罚值，并且计入你的多次攻击罚值。

该武器的打击（Strike）是近战法术攻击。无论其外观为何，该武器造成1d8+你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。你可以造成通常该武器所造成类型的伤害，而不是力场伤害（或者对于多用武器而言，任何其可用的伤害类型）。武器的其他数据和特征不会生效，远程武器也只能攻击相邻的生物。除了进行的是法术攻击，灵能武器对于触发条件，抗力和其他能力而言是一件武器。

该武器不会占据空间，赋予夹击，以及其他任何一个生物可能具有的特征。除了其打击（Strike）以外，该武器不能尝试其他任何攻击，并且影响武器的专长或者法术对该武器无效。

升阶（+2） 该武器的伤害增加1d8。

entries.name: Splash of Art
entries.description:
A deluge of colorful illusory paint, tools, or other symbols of art and artisanship drift down in the area. Roll 1d4 to determine the color of the illusion. Each creature in the area must attempt a Will save. A creature is unaffected on a success. On a failure or critical failure, the creature takes the results listed on the table relevant to the color.

Splash of Art

1d4 Color Failure Critical Failure
1 White @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} 1 round Dazzled 1 minute
2 Red @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 1 for 1 round Enfeebled 2 for 1 round
3 Yellow @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1 Frightened 2
4 Blue @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} 1 for 1 round Clumsy 2 for 1 round

entries.name: Spray of Stars
entries.description:
You fling a spray of tiny shooting stars, dealing [[/r 1d4 #fire]] fire damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is Dazzled for 3 rounds.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is
Dazzled for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by [[/r 1d4 #fire]].

entries.name: 稳定伤势 STABILIZE
entries.description:
正能量将目标从鬼门关拉回。

目标失去濒死状态，但它仍然失去意识，并为0生命值。

entries.name: Stasis
entries.description:
The flow of time congeals around an object or creature, holding it in place. The target must attempt a Will save (an unattended object automatically critically fails its save).

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is Stunned 1 as time thickens around it.

Failure Time ceases to pass for the target for 1 round. It is invulnerable to all damage, it cannot be targeted or affected by anything, and no rounds elapse for any timed durations, conditions, afflictions, and other effects it has. While in stasis, the target can't be moved, and it remains fixed in place, defying gravity if need be.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is held in stasis for 3 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round or end it entirely on a critical success.

entries.name: Statuette
entries.description:
This ritual is a variant of the shrink item spell that allows for the transformation of significantly larger items. You transform the object into a tiny statuette of itself that is Light Bulk. The ritual does not shrink any creatures inside or on top of the item when it is transformed. The item remains in statuette form until the ritual's duration expires or until a creature places it on a stable surface and uses a 10-minute activity to Interact with the item to enlarge it. When restored to its normal size, the object simply pushes other creatures and objects aside or harmlessly contains them, as a magic item with the structure trait.

Your Arcana check determines how long the object remains in statuette form.

Critical Success The object remains a statuette for 1 week.

Success The object remains a statuette for 1 day.

Failure You fail to shrink the object.

Critical Failure You fail to shrink the object, and the highest-level item you carry of light Bulk or more shrinks to a tiny, unusable figurine of itself, weighing negligible bulk, for 1 week.

entries.name: 关照术 STATUS
entries.description:
只要你和目标处于相同的位面，并且均活着，你就会一直知晓其当前状态。

只要你和目标处于相同的位面，并且均活着，你就会一直知晓其当前状态。你知晓目标和你相对的方向，与你的距离，以及任何正影响其的状态。

升阶（4环级） 该法术的射程增加到30尺，并且你能以至多10个生物为目标。

entries.name: Steal Shadow
entries.description:
You steal a creature's shadow, leaving it weakened and vulnerable. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 1 for 1 round.

Failure The target takes [[/r 3d4 #negative]] negative damage and is Enfeebled 1 for the spell's duration as you tear its shadow away, collecting it in your hand. On subsequent rounds, when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}, you can throttle the shadow to deal [[/r 3d4 #negative]] negative damage to the target (basic Fortitude save). Until the spell ends, the target doesn't cast a shadow.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is Enfeebled 2.

Heightened (+1) The damage when the spell is cast and when it is sustained increases by [[/r 1d4 #negative]].

entries.name: Steal the Sky
entries.description:
Cast R verbal;

Trigger You make a successful unarmed Strike against a flying creature.

Targets the creature you hit

Saving Throw Fortitude

You deny a flying creature the support of the air.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The target descends 60 feet. If it hits a surface, it takes bludgeoning damage as if it had fallen.

Failure As success, and if the target hits a surface, it falls prone and can't @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature takes double damage from hitting a surface.

Heightened (+1) Increase the distance the creature must descend by 20 feet.

entries.name: 臭云术 STINKING CLOUD
entries.description:
你在目标区域中创造一团腐臭的云雾。

这如同隐雾术（obscuring mist）（见355页）一般，除了在云雾中结束回合的生物会恶心。（此处隐蔽效果不是毒素效果。）

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 目标获得恶心1。

失败 目标获得恶心1，并且在云内时获得缓慢1。

大失败 目标获得恶心2，并且获得缓慢1，直到离开云。

entries.name: Stoke the Heart
entries.description:
Intense fervor fills the target creature, empowering their blows. The target gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls. Once this spell ends, the target becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Heightened (+2) The status bonus to damage increases by 1.

entries.name: 石言术 STONE TELL
entries.description:
你可以对自然或者加工过的石头提出问题，以及从石头获得回答。

虽然石头没有智力，但你是和石头的自然精魂对话，其人格受石头类型，对于加工过的石头而言是石头所处于的建筑类型影响。石头的视角，认知，和知识令其世界观与人类截然不同，它与人关注的重点相去甚远。石头通常能回答关于过去接触了它的生物，以及他的下面或者后面藏匿着何物的问题。

entries.name: 解除石化 STONE TO FLESH
entries.description:
通过操控物质的基本粒子，你将石头转变为血肉。

你将被石化的生物转变会其正常状态，或者将一块石头物体转变为一团形状差不多的没有生命的血肉（但没有石头的硬度）。

entries.name: 石肤术 STONESKIN
entries.description:
目标的皮肤如岩石般坚硬。

它获得对物理伤害的抗力5，除了精金。每当目标被钝击，穿刺或者挥砍攻击命中时，石肤术的持续时间减少1轮。

升阶（6环级） 该抗力提高到10。

升阶（8环级） 该抗力提高到15。

升阶（10环级） 该抗力提高到20。

entries.name: Storm Lord
entries.description:
The sky above you darkens in a matter of moments, swirling with ominous clouds punctuated by flashes of lighting. The first time you Sustain this Spell each round, you can select one of the following effects to occur in the area.

  • Calm No additional effect.
  • Fog Heavy fog rolls in, concealing the area with the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}.
  • Rain Torrential rain falls from the sky, dousing ordinary flames. Creatures in the area take a -2 circumstance penalty to Acrobatics and Perception checks.
  • Wind Powerful winds buffet the area in all directions. Ranged attacks take a -4 circumstance penalty, and all flying is against the wind and counts as moving through difficult terrain.

In addition, once per round you can use a single action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits, to call down a bolt of lightning, striking any target in range that you can see. You deal 10d6 electricity damage to the target; it must attempt a basic Reflex save. On a failure, it is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

entries.name: 复仇风暴 STORM OF VENGEANCE
entries.description:
巨大的的风暴在360尺爆发范围的空中形成。

在风暴下，大雨瓢泼，暴风对物理远程攻击和武器远程攻击造成-4环境罚值，并且区域中的空中对飞行生物而言视为艰难地形。当你施放该法术以及每轮第一次你维持该法术时，你可以选择下列一个暴风效果。你不能连续选择两次相同的效果。

酸雨 风暴中的每个生物承受4d8酸伤害，无豁免。

冰雹 风暴对其下方生物造成4d10钝击伤害（基础强韧豁免）。

闪电 至多10道闪电从天而降，目标为你选择的风暴中的生物。一个生物最多仅能被一道闪电作为目标。每道闪电造成7d6闪电伤害（基础反射豁免）。

风雨 狂风暴雨令移动困难，可见度低下，这使暴风下的区域成为困难地形，并令任何区域内部或者透过该区域所看到的东西处于隐蔽。

滚雷 在风暴中的每个生物必须成功通过一次强韧豁免，否则耳聋10分钟。成功豁免的生物会暂时免疫复仇风暴的滚雷1小时。

升阶（10环级） 该射程增加大哦2200尺，云的大小为1000尺爆发。

entries.name: Stormwind Flight
entries.description:
Powerful winds carry you smoothly through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}.

Heightened (6th) When you fly using stormwind flight, you don't count flying against the wind as difficult terrain.

entries.name: 奇异几何 STRANGE GEOMETRY
entries.description:
你令该区域扭曲，溶化，断层，缠绕，总体产生一种怪异的空间几何。

法术区域的立方体之间不能相邻。当你施放该法术时处于某个立方体中的生物，以及在法术生效时进入区域之一的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免，这具有下列效果。与幻想交互的生物也会如常获得一次意志豁免来不相信幻觉。

成功 该生物不相信该幻觉。

失败 所有在立方体中的地形对该生物均为困难地形，如果该生物在飞行也包括空中，如果该生物在攀爬也包括墙壁，以此类推。当该生物将离开某个立方体是，它会从一个由GM决定的随机立方体出来。这是一个传送效果。它可以选择从这个立方体的任一边缘离开。当选择随机立方体时，GM应当排除任何和生物所处地形不对应的立方体；例如，如果生物沿着地面离开，GM应当排除任何不含地面出口的立方体。

entries.name: 深层暗示 SUBCONSCIOUS SUGGESTION
entries.description:
你在目标的心智深处埋下潜意识的暗示，它们会在你指定的触发条件发生时（如305页所述）遵照其行动。

你向目标指示一系列动作。你的指示的用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和他们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 指示会保留在目标潜意识中，直到下一次你每日准备。如果触发条件在那之前发生，目标会立即按照你的指示行动。该效果的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但该持续时间为1小时。

升阶（9环级） 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

entries.name: 瞬间枯萎 SUDDEN BLIGHT
entries.description:
你加速区域中的腐坏过程。

在该区域中的每个生物承受2d10负能量伤害（基础强韧豁免）。被疾病影响的生物在此次豁免上承受-2环境罚值。你可以将该枯萎转为侵蚀区域中所有小型和超小型非生物植物，清除非魔法的下层植被，以及其造成的任何困难地形及隐蔽。瞬间枯萎会在令植物凋零前会尝试反制植物上的任何魔法效果。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加1d10。

entries.name: Sudden Bolt
entries.description:
You call down a small bolt of lightning on the target, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

entries.name: Sudden Shift
entries.description:
Trigger An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

You swiftly move from a dangerous spot and veil yourself. You Step and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

entries.name: 暗示术 SUGGESTION
entries.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。

你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和他们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶（8环级） 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

entries.name: 召唤动物 SUMMON ANIMAL
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的动物。

你召唤一个具有动物特征的常见生物，其等级为-1。升阶该法术会增加你能召唤的生物的最大等级。

升阶（2环级） 等级1。

升阶（3环级） 等级2。

升阶（4环级） 等级3。

升阶（5环级） 等级5。

升阶（6环级） 等级7。

升阶（7环级） 等级9。

升阶（8环级） 等级11。

升阶（9环级） 等级13。

升阶（10环级） 等级15。

entries.name: 召唤天族 SUMMON CELESTIAL
entries.description:
你创造一个为你的阵营而战的天族。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有天族特征的常见生物，其等级为5或者更低。仅当召唤的生物的阵营是你的神祇偏好阵营时你才能召唤它（如果你没有神祇，则为你的阵营1阶以内）。根据GM的判断，部分神祇可能严格限定特定类型的天族，而不仅仅是阵营相符。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤构装体 SUMMON CONSTRUCT
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的构装体。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有构装体特征的常见生物，其等级为-1。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤巨龙 SUMMON DRAGON
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的龙。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有龙特征的常见生物，其等级为5或者更低。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤元素 SUMMON ELEMENTAL
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的元素生物。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有元素特征的常见生物，其等级为1或者更低。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤怪形 SUMMON ENTITY
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的异怪。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有异怪特征的常见生物，其等级为5或者更低。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤精类 SUMMON FEY
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的精怪。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有精类特征的常见生物，其等级为-1。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤魔物 SUMMON FIEND
entries.description:
你创造一个为你的阵营而战的魔物。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有魔物特征的常见生物，其等级为5或者更低。仅当召唤的生物的阵营是你的神祇偏好阵营时你才能召唤它（如果你没有神祇，则为你的阵营1阶以内）。根据GM的判断，部分神祇可能严格限定特定类型的魔物，而不仅仅是阵营相符。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤巨人 SUMMON GIANT
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的巨人。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有巨人特征的常见生物，其等级为5或者更低。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: 召唤乐器 SUMMON INSTRUMENT
entries.description:
你在手中创造出一个手持乐器（handheld musical instrument）。

该乐器十分平常，但只能被你所演奏。在法术结束时，该乐器消失。如果你再次施放召唤乐器，任何你之前召唤的乐器会消失。

升阶（5环级） 该乐器改为一件专家级手持乐器（virtuoso handheld instrument）。

entries.name: 召唤植物与真菌 SUMMON PLANT OR FUNGUS
entries.description:
你创造一个为你而战的植物或者真菌。

这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有植物或者真菌特征的常见生物，其等级为-1。

升阶 如召唤动物（summon animal）。

entries.name: Sun Blade
entries.description:
You fire a ray of burning sunlight from your weapon. You must be wielding a sword or spear to cast sun blade, and you perform this spell's somatic component with the weapon. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 1d4 fire damage. If the target is evil, the ray deals an additional 1d4 good damage, and if the target is undead, the ray deals an additional 1d4 positive damage (both effects apply against creatures that are both evil and undead). If you are in an area of bright natural sunlight, increase the die size of each damage die by one step (from d4 to d6).

Critical Success The ray deals double damage.

Failure The ray deals full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 fire, 1d4 good, and 1d4 positive (or 1d6 of each type of damage in bright natural sunlight).

entries.name: Sun's Fury
entries.description: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r 1d4 #fire]] fire and [[/r 1 #good]] good damage on a successful @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

entries.name: 阳炎爆 SUNBURST
entries.description:
强力而耀眼的球状日光在区域中爆开。

对该区域中的生物和物体造成8d10火焰伤害，以及对不死生物造成8d10额外正能量伤害。在该区域中的每个生物和物体必须尝试一次反射豁免。

大成功 该生物或者物体不受影响。

成功 该生物或者物体承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物或者物体承受完整伤害。

大失败 该生物或者物体承受完整伤害。如果它是生物，它永久目盲（blinded）。

如果阳炎爆的球状区域与魔法黑暗的区域部分重叠，则会尝试反制该黑暗效果。

升阶（+1） 该火焰伤害增加1d10，并且对不死生物的正能量伤害增加1d10。

entries.name: Swamp of Sloth
entries.description:
Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid. The area is difficult terrain. The sludge at the bottom of the morass animates into diminutive sludge beasts that have a demonic appearance. These don't function as normal creatures, but they swarm over creatures in the swamp and exude a noxious stench. The swamp deals 1d6 poison damage; creatures that end their turn in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save. You can increase the number of actions it takes to Cast the Spell. For each additional action, increase the burst's radius by 5 feet.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6, and the initial radius increases by 5 feet.

entries.name: Swarm Form
entries.description:
You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures. While in swarm form, you have the swarm trait and you gain resistance 5 to slashing and piercing damage and weakness 5 to area and splash damage. You can fit into spaces only a few inches wide, moving your constituent creatures through the gap. You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. As a swarm, you can't speak, cast spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, activate your magic items, or make any of your Strikes with your normal body. You can Dismiss the Spell.

Heightened (+2) Increase your resistances and weaknesses each by 5.

entries.name: Swarming Wasp Stings
entries.description:
You manifest a swarm of disembodied wasp stingers that stab creatures in the area, possibly poisoning them. Creatures in the affected area take [[/r 1d6 #piercing]] piercing damage. Each creature that takes piercing damage must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes [[/r 2d6 #poison]] poison damage.

Failure The target is afflicted with Swarming Wasp Venom at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with swarming wasp venom at stage 2.

Swarming Wasp Venom (poison) Level 7

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 2d6 poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 3d6 poison damage and Clumsy 2 (1 round)

entries.name: Swarmsense
entries.description:
You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures. You create a crawling swarm in your square. You can hear through the swarm as if using your normal auditory senses. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move the swarm 10 feet along the ground in any direction. The swarm has AC 15 and a +0 bonus to its saves. Any damage dealt to the swarm destroys it and ends the spell.

Heightened (3rd) The swarm has the benefits of spider climb.

Heightened (5th) The swarm has a fly Speed of 10 feet. You can see through the swarm using your visual senses.

Heightened (7th) The swarm gains a 10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.

entries.name: Sweet Dream
entries.description:
With soothing song or tales, you lull the target into an enchanting dream. When you cast the spell, the target falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} if it wasn't already. While Unconscious, it experiences a dream of your choice. If it sleeps for at least 1 minute, it gains the benefit of the dream for the remainder of the spell's duration.

  • Dream of Insight +1 status bonus to Intelligence-based skill checks
  • Dream of Glamour +1 status bonus to Charisma-based skill checks
  • Dream of Voyaging +5-foot status bonus to Speed If you Cast this Spell again, the effects of any previous sweet dream you cast end.

entries.name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
entries.description:
Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns. Attempt a Performance check to counteract one of the following conditions affecting the target: @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned}. If you fail, you can't target that effect on the target for 1 day. Use the condition's source to determine the counteract DC (for example, the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}DC for grabbed).

Heightened (9th) You can target up to four creatures.

entries.name: 神经脉冲 SYNAPTIC PULSE
entries.description:
你释放出爆发的精神脉冲，穿透区域中每个敌人的精神。

每个该区域中的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物获得震慑1。

失败 该生物获得震慑2。

大失败 该生物震慑，持续1轮。

entries.name: 通感超载 SYNESTHESIA
entries.description:
目标的感官被胡乱地重新连接，它将噪音认知为弥漫的色彩，将气味认知为声音，等等等等。

这具有三种效果，目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

由于这种干扰，每次目标使用具有专注特征的行动时，必须成功通过DC5裸骰检定，否则动作失败并被浪费。

目标难以处理视觉信息，令所有生物和物体对其为隐蔽。

该生物移动困难，令其获得笨拙3，并且令其在速度上获得-10尺状态罚值。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标受到影响1轮。

失败 目标受到影响1分钟。

大失败 如同失败，并且目标为了处理混乱的感官信息获得震慑2。

升阶（9环级） 你能以至多五个生物为目标。

entries.name: Take its Course
entries.description:
When someone has overindulged, you can hasten them past the worst of their affliction or intensify their misery. This spell attempts to progress a disease affliction, a poison affliction, or persistent poison damage affecting the target. If the target is affected by more than one of these, you can choose from among those you are aware of; otherwise the GM chooses randomly. An unwilling target can attempt a Will save to negate take its course.

The effect of this spell depends on whether you're attempting to end an affliction or persistent poison damage, and whether you are attempting to help or hinder the target's recovery.

  • Affliction The target immediately attempts its next saving throw against the affliction. You can grant the creature your choice of a +2 status bonus or a -2 status penalty to its saving throw against the affliction.
  • Persistent Poison You can cause the target take the persistent poison damage immediately when you Cast this Spell (in addition to taking it at the end of its next turn). Whether or not you do so, the target attempts an additional flat check against the persistent poison damage. You can set the DC of that flat check to 5 or 20 instead of the normal DC.

Heightened (7th) You can attempt to progress any number of the target's eligible afflictions and persistent poison damage.

entries.name: 死者交谈 TALKING CORPSE
entries.description:
你赋予目标尸体生命的要素，令其能够回答三个你向它提出的问题。

该法术会唤起身躯的潜在记忆，而不是唤回目标已经死去的灵魂，所以该法术需要该尸体基本完好才能运作。尸体受到的损伤越多，其回答的笼统与拼凑程度也就越大，并且它必须要有嘴和喉咙才有可能说话。如果任何人在一周内已经对该尸体施放了该法术，该法术会自动失败。该尸体可以尝试一次意志豁免来抵抗回答该问题，使用其原本生物在死亡时的数据，并且有下列效果。

大成功 目标可以撒谎或者拒绝回答你的问题，并且该目标的灵魂会对你作祟24小时，不断干扰你，令你在此期间无法获得任何休息。

成功 目标可以提供错误的信息，或者拒绝回答你的问题。

失败 目标必须如实回答问题，但它的回答可以是简短的，谜语般的，重复的。它仍然可以误导你，或者尝试拖延时间，以令在你问完所有问题之前法术持续时间耗尽。

大失败 如同失败，但是目标的答案会更加直接，很少重复，但仍然如同谜语。在它欺骗和误导你的欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-2状态罚值。

entries.name: 绊足术 TANGLEFOOT
entries.description:
一条布满粘液的藤蔓在空中出现，它从你的手中弹出，抽向目标。

对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰。

大成功 目标获得禁足状态，并且在其速度上获得-10尺环境罚值，持续1轮。它能尝试对抗你的法术DC以脱逃，来移除罚值和禁足状态。

成功 目标在速度上承受-10尺环境罚值，持续1轮。它能尝试对抗你的法术DC以脱逃，来移除罚值。

失败 目标不受影响。

升阶（2环级） 该效果持续2轮。

升阶（4环级） 该效果持续1分钟。

entries.name: 缠结匐蔓 TANGLING CREEPERS
entries.description:
茂密缠绕的蔓生植物从区域中所有表面中冒出，并充实每一块水体。

在该区域中的，在地面上移动的，在藤蔓上攀爬或者游泳的生物，在其速度上承受-10尺环境罚值。每轮一次，你可以通过一个具有专注特征的动作，令藤蔓从任何方格涌出。该藤蔓具有15尺触及，并且使用你的法术攻击调整值进行一次近战攻击。如果攻击成功，该藤蔓会将目标拽入蔓生植物中，令其禁足，持续1轮，或者直到该生物逃脱（Escape）（对抗你的法术DC），以先发生为准。

entries.name: 念动移物 TELEKINETIC HAUL
entries.description:
你移动目标至多20尺，可能令其停留在半空。

当你维持该法术时，你可以再次如此做，或者你可以选择移动另一个可行的目标。

entries.name: 念动战技 TELEKINETIC MANEUVER
entries.description:
你通过一股猛烈的念动力移动一个敌人或者其携带的事物。

你可以使用法术攻击骰，而不是运动（Athletics）检定，对目标尝试卸武（Disarm），推撞（Shove），或者摔绊（Trip）。

entries.name: 念动射弹 TELEKINETIC PROJECTILE
entries.description:
你向目标射出区域中一个未固定的，无主的，1负载1以下的物体。

对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰。如果你命中，你造成钝击，穿刺，或者挥砍伤害（对应于你所扔出的物体），数值等于1d6加上你的施法属性调整值。射出物体的特殊特征或者魔法特性不会影响该攻击或者伤害。

大成功 你造成双倍伤害。

成功 你造成完整伤害。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加1d6。

entries.name: 心灵连线 TELEPATHIC BOND
entries.description:
这些目标能和任意或者全部在同一星球上的其他法术目标通过心灵感应交流。

这些目标能和任意或者全部在同一星球上的其他法术目标通过心灵感应交流。

entries.name: 心灵暗示 TELEPATHIC DEMAND
entries.description:
你向目标发送一段25词或者更短的信息，并且它能够立即回复一段由他所编纂的25词或者更短的信息。

你的信息十分阴险，具有暗示术（suggestion）（见374页）的效果，该信息内容会代替为口头的指示。当豁免成功时，目标会暂时免疫1天，并且在大成功时，目标会暂时免疫1个月。仅有你曾经通过心灵感应接触的生物可以作为目标，例如通过心灵感应法术。

entries.name: 心灵感应 TELEPATHY
entries.description:
你可以与30尺内的生物通过心灵感应交流。

当你和一个生物交流并建立连接时，该交流是双向的。你只能和与你有相同语言的生物交流。

升阶（6环级） 心灵感应失去语言特征。即使你们没有相同的语言，你也可以使用共通的心灵影响和其他生物交流。

entries.name: 传送术 TELEPORT
entries.description:
你和目标会立即传送到射程内的任何位置。

只要你能通过该地点到你起始地点的相对位置，以及其外观（或者典型特征）来精确定位该地点。关于该地点外观的错误的知识会令法术失败，但它也可能导致传送到非预想地点或者造成其他由GM决定的事故。传送术在距离很远时无法保证精确。目标会在距离目标地大约总旅行距离1%的地方出现，其偏移方向由GM决定。对于短途旅行，这种误差可以忽略，但是对于长距旅行这可能达到1英里。

升阶（7环级） 你和其他目标可以传送到1000英里内的任何地点。

升阶（8环级） 你和其他目标可以传送到同一星球上的任何地点。如果你旅行超过1000英里，你只会偏移目标10英里。

升阶（9环级） 你和其他目标可以传送到同一行星系中任何其他行星上的任意地点。若你对该地点的位置和外观有准确的知识，你会到达该星球上偏移目标100英里的位置。

升阶（10环级） 如9环级版本，但是你和其他目标可以旅行到同一恒星系中的任何行星上。

entries.name: 传送法阵 Teleportation Circle
entries.description:
描述 你在地面创造一个直径10尺的法阵，这个法阵会充当通往目的地（在仪式中指定）的入口。你会在仪式中以仪式的一部分来指定目的地。该目的地无法变更。目的地必须位于距离法阵的1000英里范围内，且与法阵处于相同的位面。你必须能够精确地识别目的地与创造法阵的位置之间的相对位置，而且能够通过外观（或者其他可识别的特征）来精确识别目的地。目的地也是一个直径10尺的法阵，它不能与任何实心建筑重叠，也不能是有害或有危险的地方。

为仪式尝试的生存检定的次要施法者能够直接身处目的地所在的确切地点，而非与你同处于起始法阵。若次要施法者在目的地的检定成功，而且你的检定也成功了，则该仪式会被视为大成功作为替代。

当法阵处于激活状态时，任何完全进入法阵的生物都会被立即传送至目的地。不愿被传送的生物能尝试意志豁免来抵抗该效果。若它停留在法阵内，则该生物必须在自己的每个回合结束时再次尝试上述豁免。

传送法阵通常时单向的，不过你可以通过把仪式的开销翻倍来使得传送法阵变为双向的。

大成功 你成功创造了传送法阵，无论传送距离多远，它都能十分精确地抵达。通过法阵的旅行者能准确地抵达指定地点。

成功 同大成功，但是传送法阵的目的地稍有偏差，目的地偏离目标的距离大约为传送总距离的1%，最远偏离距离为10英里。

失败 传送法阵无法生效。

大失败 传送法阵错得离谱。它会把人从起始点向着随机方向传送，传送距离与原本的距离相同，而且如此传送发生其他非常见事故的概率也会更高。

升阶 （9环）　开销增加至2000gp，持续时间增加至1个月，目的地可以是同星球（same planet）上的任意位置。

（10环）　开销增加至10000gp，持续时间变为无限，目的地可以是同星球（same planet）上的任意位置。

entries.name: Tempest Form
entries.description:
Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.
When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast this Spell}, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist. You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You also gain the following effects based on your form.
• Air You gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly} Speed of 20 feet and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} while you are in the air. You can create the effects of a gust of wind from your space as a 2-action activity, which
has the manipulate trait.
• Mist You gain a Fly Speed of 20 feet, and it becomes hard to see through you. Any creature on one side of your space who is targeted by a creature on the opposite side is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to the targeting creature.
• Water You gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} Speed of 20 feet and become Invisible while you are in the water. You can electrically
charge yourself by taking a single action, which has the
manipulate trait. If you do, you are no longer Invisible in the water due to electricity indicating your location, but any creature that makes a melee attack against you takes [[/r 1d6 #electricity]] electricity damage; if it touches you, this is cumulative with the damage from your major curse.

Heightened (+2) Increase the resistance by 5 and the
electricity damage from the charged water form by 1.

entries.name: Tempest Surge
entries.description:
You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning. The storm deals 1d12 electricity damage. The target must attempt a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target also is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} 2 for 1 round and takes 1 persistent electricity damage.

Heightened (+1) The initial damage increases by 1d12, and the persistent electricity damage on a failure increases by 1.

entries.name: Tempest Touch
entries.description:
Your touch calls forth a churning mass of icy water that clings to your target, dealing [[/r 1d4 #bludgeoning]] bludgeoning damage and [[/r 1d4 #cold]] cold damage. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage and a -5-foot
circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the end of your
next turn.

Failure The target takes full damage and a -10-foot
circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the end of your
next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target takes double
damage.

Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning and cold damage each
increase by [[/r 1d4]].

entries.name: 临时工具
entries.description: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands. It lasts until it is used for a single activity or for 1 minute, whichever comes first, after which it disappears. The tool is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

entries.name: Tempt Fate
entries.description:
Trigger You or an ally within range attempts a saving throw.

You twist the forces of fate to make a moment dire or uneventful, with no in-between. The target gains a +1 status bonus to the triggering saving throw. If the saving throw's result is a success, it becomes a critical success. If it's a failure, it becomes a critical failure, and the critical failure can't be reduced by abilities that usually reduce critical failure, such as improved evasion. If the triggering ability did not have both a critical success and critical failure condition, tempt fate fails, but you don't expend the Focus Point for Casting this Spell.

Heightened (8th) The bonus on the saving throw is +2.

entries.name: Tentacular Limbs
entries.description:
Your arms turn into long, pliable tentacles, increasing your reach when you're delivering touch range spells and making unarmed Strikes with your arms (such as fist and claw Strikes) to 10 feet. This doesn't change the reach of your melee weapon attacks. During the duration, whenever you Cast a Spell, you can add an additional action to that spell's casting to temporarily extend your reach to 20 feet to deliver that spell.

Heightened (+2) When you add an additional action to a spell to temporarily extend your reach, your reach increases by an additional 10 feet to deliver that spell.

entries.name: Terminate Bloodline
entries.description:
Mighty drow noble houses, including House Shraen, use this ritual to stamp out fledgling noble houses before they rise to power. At the ritual's completion, you place a contagious wasting disease upon the target creature with the intention of ending their familial bloodline.

The ritual is easiest to cast on a subdued target, typically a low-ranking member of the targeted family bloodline who is kidnapped and has their memory wiped. If the target is conscious when the ritual is cast, the target attempts a Fortitude save against the ritual's DC; on a success, the ritual fails. Otherwise, the target is automatically affected by the dying bloodline disease.

Dying Bloodline (curse, disease) Failing or critically failing this disease's Fortitude save causes the disease to progress to the next stage as normal; however, succeeding or critically succeeding at the save has no effect. The disease can be removed only by first successfully counteracting the curse and then counteracting the disease;

Level equal to twice the ritual's level;

Stage 1 carrier with no effect (1 month);

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 week);

Stage 3 fatigued and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} 1 (1 day);

Stage 4 fatigued and drained 3 (1 day);

Stage 5 death.

Every member of an infected creature's immediate family (blood relationship or parent or child) that comes into physical contact with that infected creature must attempt a Fortitude save or contract the disease.

Critical Success The creature does not contract the disease and does not need to attempt further saves when coming into physical contact with that particular creature (the creature is not immune to the disease, however, and must attempt a save as normal if it comes into physical contact with a different infected family member).

Success The creature is not affected but must attempt another save the next time they come into physical contact with that particular infected creature.

Failure The creature contracts the disease and can spread it in the same way as the original target.

entries.name: Terrain Transposition
entries.description: You mystically transpose your current location with another. While in a wilderness environment, you transport yourself and items you're holding to a clear space you can see within range. If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain} and both your starting and ending position are in your favored terrain, the range increases to 180 feet. If you have an animal companion and it is adjacent to you, you can transport it along with you to an adjacent open space, but if this spell would bring any other creature with you, even in an extradimensional container, the spell is lost.

entries.name: 联结术
entries.description:
You use magical chains, vines, or other tethers to bind your target to you. The creature can still try to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and it or others can break the tethers by attacking them (the tethers have AC 15 and 10 Hit Points). You must stay within 30 feet of the target while it is tethered; moving more than 30 feet away from your target ends the spell. The target must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed as long as it is within 30 feet of you.

Failure The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed and cannot move more than 30 feet away from you until it Escapes or the spell ends.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes or the spell ends.

Heightened (+1) The tethers' AC increases by 3 and their Hit Points increase by 10.

entries.name: 心念馈赠 THOUGHTFUL GIFT
entries.description:
你将一个手握的负载为轻或者可忽略的物体传送到目标处。

如果目标有自由手，该物体立即在目标的手中出现，否则在其脚边出现。目标直到你尝试送过去的物体为何。如果目标失去意识，或者拒绝接受你的赠予，或者法术会传送一个生物（即使该生物在一个异次元容器中），该法术结束。

升阶（3环级） 法术的射程增加到500尺。

升阶（5环级） 如同3环级，但是该物体的最大负载增加到1。你可以通过3个动作而非1个动作来施放该法术；如此做射程会增加到1英里，并且你与目标间无需视觉线，但你必须和目标非常熟悉。

entries.name: 三相 THREEFOLD ASPECT
entries.description:
此法术令你能够在自身的三个不同年龄状态中转换：少女（青年），母亲（成年），老妪（老年）。

在施放该法术是选择其中之一。在法术持续时间内，你可以通过一个具有专注特征的动作，改变到三个年龄状态中任一或者你正常的年龄状态。你的外形无论年龄如何看起来总是像你，认识你的生物仍然能认出你，并且可以发现你的年龄不一样了。

三相会改变你的物理弯管和性格，以展现你不同年龄中的逼真形象。这会令你在假装成选择的年龄的欺骗（Deception）上获得+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训，也能讲等级作为熟练加值加到这些检定上。除此之外，除非一个生物专门使用搜索（Seek）动作，或者用其他方式仔细检查你，它无法进一步了解你不处于你的真实年龄。你可以解消该法术。

entries.name: Thunderburst
entries.description:
You create a powerful blast of air and a loud peal of thunder, dealing [[/r 2d6 #bludgeoning]] bludgeoning damage and [[/r 2d6 #sonic]] sonic damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is
Deafened for 1 hour.

Heightened (+2) Increase each type of damage by [[/r 2d6]] and the area by 5 feet.

entries.name: Tidal Surge
entries.description:
You call forth a tremendous wave to move the target either in a body of water or on the ground. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Failure You move the target 5 feet in any direction along the ground or 10 feet in any direction through a body of water.

Critical Failure You move the target up to 10 feet in any direction along the ground or 20 feet in any direction through a body of water.

entries.name: 时间信标
entries.description: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong. You can cast time beacon on only your turn. Keep careful track of everything that happens this turn after you cast time beacon. At the end of your turn, you can choose to rewind time back to just after you cast time beacon, removing all effects of your turn since then. Curses, traps, and other harmful effects that happen during your turn might prevent you from returning to the beacon if they are powerful enough. If you suffered any harmful effects during your turn after casting time beacon, to return to your beacon, time beacon attempts a counteract check against each such effect. If it fails at any of these checks, you can't return.

entries.name: 时间静止 TIME STOP
entries.description:
你暂时停止除了自身以外的所有事物的时间，这令你能够使用数个动作，但在其他人看来似乎完全没有消耗时间。

在施放时间静止后，你可以立即使用至多9个动作，它包括3组，每组3个动作。在每组动作后，仅对你，指定你为目标或者影响你的效果，以及你在时间静止中创造的效果会经过1轮。所有其他生物和物体不会被你的攻击影响，并且你无法以任何东西影响它们，或以他们为目标。当你完成你的动作后，其他世界的时间会再次流动。如果你创造了一个效果，其持续时间会超过时间静止的持续时间，它会立即影响其他人，但这对在你刚施放该法术时发生的效果没有作用。

entries.name: Tireless Worker
entries.description: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}. If you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.

entries.name: 巧言术 TONGUES
entries.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。

当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶（7环级） 该持续时间增加到8小时。

entries.name: Touch of Corruption
entries.description:
You infuse the target with negative energy. If the target is living, this deals [[/r 1d6 #negative]] negative damage (basic Fortitude save); on a failed save, the target also takes a -2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

If the target is a willing undead creature, the target instead regains 6 Hit Points, and if you are the undead target, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 round.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage dealt to a living creature by [[/r 1d6]] or increase the Hit Points regained by undead by 6.

entries.name: 愚者之触 TOUCH OF IDIOCY
entries.description:
你令目标精神迟钝。

目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标获得呆滞2。

大失败 目标获得呆滞4。

entries.name: Touch of Obedience
entries.description:
Your imperious touch erodes the target's willpower, making it easier to control. The target attempts a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} 1 until the end of your current turn.

Failure The target is Stupefied 1 until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure The target is Stupefied 1 for 1 minute.

entries.name: Touch of the Moon
entries.description:
When you touch the target, a symbol of the moon appears on its forehead, glowing with soft moonlight. The target glows with dim light in a 20-foot radius. It also gets a benefit based on a phase of the moon, starting with the new moon and changing to the next phase at the end of each of its turns.

  • New Moon The target receives no benefit.
  • Waxing Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.
  • Full Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, and saving throws and a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.
  • Waning Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws. After this phase, return to the new moon.

entries.name: Touch of Undeath
entries.description:
You attack the target's life force with undeath, dealing 1d6 negative damage. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage, and positive effects heal it only half as much as normal for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, and positive effects heal it only half as much as normal for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Transcribe Moment
entries.description: You instantly create a small, permanent scroll that contains a magically precise written description of your current surroundings in every direction. Any creature who spends 1 minute to read the scroll-written in a language of your choice that you know-immediately sees and experiences your surroundings during the moment that you recorded (including whatever events transpired that round) exactly as you experienced it. This depiction records only what you can sense yourself. For example, if you can't see invisible creatures, the depiction doesn't reveal them even to a reader who could normally see them; a reader can't use their Perception to notice details you missed, but they can attempt a check to Recall Knowledge based on what they just experienced if they have knowledge that you lack. You can have multiple scrolls from transcribe moment in existence at the same time, up to a number equal to your Intelligence modifier. If you Cast the Spell again while already at the maximum number of scrolls, choose one of the current scrolls to lose its magic, then create the new one.

entries.name: 石泥转化 TRANSMUTE ROCK AND MUD
entries.description:
你转变大地的材质，将石头转化为淤泥，或者将淤泥转化为石头。

在你施放该法术时，选择下列两种选项之一。

化石为泥 你将区域中非魔法，未加工，且无主的石头转变为等体积的淤泥。如果向岩石地面施放该法术，它成为困难地形；如果产生的淤泥至少有3英尺厚，这会成为高等困难地形，或者生物可以尝试游泳通过（DC10运动）。如果该淤泥深到生物无法触及底部，生物必须尝试游泳通过它。如果你对岩石房顶施放该法术，坠落的淤泥造成8d6钝击伤害（基础反射豁免），然后会散开，在比原来法术区域大半径10尺的区域中造成困难地形。一但石头被转变为淤泥，该淤泥是非魔法的，直到自然状态令其干燥或者散开。

化泥为石 区域中的淤泥变为未被加工的石头。如果淤泥被转变为石头时，生物正处于其中，它必须尝试一次豁免骰。

大成功 该生物逃出淤泥并站在石头上，不受影响。

成功 该生物在淤泥变成石头时爬出淤泥，在石头上俯卧。

失败 该生物被部分困在淤泥中，获得擒抱状态1轮，或直到其逃脱（Escape），以先发生为准。

大失败 生物被完全困住。它获得束缚，持续1轮，或者直到其逃脱，以下发生为准。

升阶（+2） 区域增加一个10尺立方体，至少与另一个立方体相邻。

entries.name: Traveler's Transit
entries.description:
You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease. When you cast this spell, you gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed.

Heightened (5th) You can choose to gain a fly Speed.

entries.name: 树化术 TREE SHAPE
entries.description:
你变形为一棵大型树。

察觉检定不会发现你的本来形态，但是通过成功的对抗你的法术DC的自然（Nature）或者生存（Survival）检定，可以发现你看起来是个树，但对于该区域而言，崭新到奇怪的程度。在树形态中，你可以观察周围所有事物，但除了通过一个具有专注特征的动作，结束该法术且结束你的回合以外，你不能进行任何行动。成为树时，你的AC为20，并且只有状态加值，状态罚值，环境加值，和环境罚值会影响你。你投出的所有成和和大成功反射豁免均为失败。

entries.name: 融身入林 TREE STRIDE
entries.description:
你进入一个主干足够大，能够容纳你的活着的树中，并立即传送到5英里内，任一种类相同的，同样树干足够大的树中。

当你进入前一棵树中时，你会立即了解到射程内其他足够大的同类树的大致位置，并且如果需要，可以从原来的树出来。你不能随身携带异次元空间；如果你尝试如此做，该法术失败。

升阶（6环级） 你出来的树可以至多距离50英里。

升阶（8环级） 你出来的树可以至多距离500英里。

升阶（9环级） 你出来的树在同一星球上的任何位置。

entries.name: Trickster's Twin
entries.description:
You rarely settle for being in just one place. Choose a location within 100 feet of the target that the target can see. You create an illusion of yourself there that only it can see and that mimics all your actions. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target believes you're in the designated location and can't see you in your actual location. The target automatically disbelieves the illusion when you use an action that doesn't make sense in the illusion's position, or if the target attacks, touches, Seeks, or otherwise engages with the illusion. If you use a hostile action against the target, the spell ends.

Failure As success, but the target must succeed at a Will save to disbelieve the illusion when one of the listed events occurs.

Critical Failure As success, but the target must critically succeed at a Will save to disbelieve when one of the listed events occurs.

entries.name: Triple Time
entries.description: You dance at a lively tempo, speeding your allies' movement. You and all allies in the area gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 round.

entries.name: 真视术 TRUE SEEING
entries.description:
你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。

GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

entries.name: 克敌机先 TRUE STRIKE
entries.description:
对未来的一瞥令你下一次攻击得到确保。

在你的回合结束前，你下一次尝试攻击骰时，这次攻击骰骰两次，并使用较好的结果。该攻击会忽视对攻击骰的环境罚值，以及其他任何目标隐蔽（concealed）或者藏匿（hidden）所导致的裸骰检定。

entries.name: 洞烛机先 TRUE TARGET
entries.description:
你深入后续数秒的可能未来，以此了解目标可能避免伤害的各种手段，并该未来的影像投射在你的身周。

在洞烛机先持续时间中，对目标的第一次攻击骰，攻击者骰两次并使用较好结果。该攻击者也会忽视对攻击骰的环境罚值，以及其他任何目标隐蔽（concealed）或者藏匿（hidden）所导致的裸骰检定。

entries.name: Unblinking Flame Revelation
entries.description: You light your foe with revealing flame. The GM attempts a secret counteract check against each illusion affecting the creature; on a success, you suppress the illusion for the duration, rather than end the effect.

entries.name: Unbreaking Wave Advance
entries.description:
You unleash a mighty wave from your hand that buffets back your foes. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If a creature pushed by unbreaking wave advance would be pushed into a solid barrier or another creature, it stops at that point and takes 3d6 damage.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is pushed 10 feet.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 20 feet.

Heightened (+1) The damage for pushing a creature into a solid barrier increases by 1d6.

entries.name: 强迫起舞 UNCONTROLLABLE DANCE
entries.description:
目标被笼罩一切的舞蹈渴求所压倒。

目标被笼罩一切的舞蹈渴求所压倒。在该法术持续时间中，目标措手不及，并且不能使用反应动作。在受到影响时，该生物除了跳舞并使用移动（Stride）动作来移动至多其速度一般的距离，不能使用任何具有移动特征的动作。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 该法术的持续时间为3轮，并且目标每轮至少须花费1个动作来跳舞。

失败 该法术的持续时间为1分钟，并且目标每轮至少须花费2个动作来跳舞。

大失败 该法术的持续时间为1分钟，并且目标每轮必须花费其所有动作来跳舞。

entries.name: Undeath's Blessing
entries.description:
You instill within a creature the touch of the grave. For the duration, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spells treat the creature as undead and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spells treat the creature as living. In addition, harm spells gain a +2 status bonus to the Hit Points restored to the target.

If the target wishes to avoid the spell, it can attempt a Will save to reduce the effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target heals half as much from heal and takes half as much damage from harm for 1 round.

Failure Effects as described in the text.

Heightened (+1) The status bonus to the Hit Points restored increases by 2.

entries.name: 隐匿阵营 UNDETECTABLE ALIGNMENT
entries.description:
你对一个生物施加防护，隐藏其阵营。

目标对于所有侦测其阵营的效果看起来均为中立。

entries.name: 诡秘怪音 UNFATHOMABLE SONG
entries.description:
飘忽的音符组成异样的乐曲，弥漫在空中，心智为之崩溃。

当你施放该法术时，以及每次你维持该法术时，每个目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。一个生物每轮只需要尝试一次豁免来对抗该乐曲，并且你在维持该法术是必须保持相同的目标。

大成功 目标不受影响，在后续轮也不受影响，并暂时免疫1分钟。

成功 目标该轮不受影响，但它可以在后续轮被影响。

失败 根据下表，骰1d4。

大失败 根据下表，骰1d4+1。

结果 效果

1 目标获得惊惧2。

2 目标困惑，持续1轮。

3 目标获得呆滞4，持续1轮。

4 目标目盲（blinded），持续1轮。

5 目标震慑，持续1轮，并且呆滞1，持续时间无限。

entries.name: 无羁行军 UNFETTERED PACK
entries.description:
你令一同旅行者无需为环境阻碍所担忧。

无论环境是否为魔法的，目标不会由于植物，碎石，狂风或者其他环境特性在速度上承受环境罚值，并且他们会忽视这些环境特性导致的困难地形。

升阶（9环级） 目标也会忽略来自环境特性的艰难地形。

entries.name: Unfolding Wind Rush
entries.description:
You travel on a rushing wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind} appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting for 1 round.

Heightened (5th) The wall of wind lasts 3 rounds.

entries.name: Unimpeded Stride
entries.description: Nothing can hold you in place. You immediately escape from every magical effect that has you @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} unless the effect is of a higher level than your unimpeded stride spell. You then Stride. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain and any circumstance or status penalties to your Speed.

entries.name: Unity
entries.description:
Trigger You and 1 or more allies within range are targeted by a spell or ability that allows a saving throw.

You put up a united defense. Each ally can use your saving throw modifier instead of its own against the triggering spell. Each ally decides individually which modifier to use.

entries.name: 无休监控 UNRELENTING OBSERVATION
entries.description:
该法术赋予完美的探知视野，令数个自愿目标可以追踪一个生物或者物体的准确移动或者位置。

选择区域中的一个目标生物或者物体，作为追踪目标。它成为该法术的传感器。你选择区域中至多五个自愿生物，该生物或者物体离开其视野时，他们可以看见该生物或者物体的隐约影像。他们能完美察觉该生物或者物体，他们可以忽视其隐蔽（concealed）或者隐身（invisible）状态，但物理障碍仍然会提供掩蔽。

除了铅或者流水能阻碍影像，追踪者能够穿过一切障碍看见被追踪生物或者物体距离没有任何影响，但该生物或者物体可能会移动过于遥远，以至于小到无法察觉。追踪者无法看见目标周围的环境，但它们能看到生物所穿戴或者持握的装备，并且他们知道这个生物从身上取下物体。

如果被追踪的目标是自愿的，该持续时间为1小时。如果你尝试追踪一个非自愿生物，目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 该生物或者物体不受影响。

成功 如上所述，并且持续时间为1分钟。

失败 如上所述，并且持续时间为1小时。

entries.name: Unseasonable Squall
entries.description:
You issue a blast of sudden wind that ripples outward from the center of the burst. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, scatters objects of light Bulk or less, and pushes unsecured objects of 1 Bulk or less 5 feet away from the spell's origin point. Each Medium or smaller creature in the area when you Cast the Spell or that moves into spell's area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the creature was Flying, it gets a critical failure instead.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 30 feet away from the center of the burst, is knocked Prone, and takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: 隐形仆役群 Unseen Custodians
entries.description:
描述 你创建出了一个处于固定地区、且长期存在的隐形仆役（unseen servant）法术效果，由力场组成的实体会在固定地点执行基础任务。

大成功 仪式创造了6个隐形仆役（数据见核心手册380页）。你不需要为它们维持专注，而且它们也不是被召唤来的仆从。你能花费1个具有专注特征的动作，以此来命令1个隐形仆役执行基础工作；它会持续执行该任务直至被再次命令为止。

成功 同大成功，但仪式只创造了3个隐形仆役。

失败 仪式没能创造任何仆役。

大失败 仪式创造了6个隐形仆役，但是这些生物具有敌意且能够使用拳头进行打击（Strikes），其攻击加值等同于你在主要技能检定中的技能调整值，造成1d6点力场伤害（force damage）。它们会攻击你以及你的盟友，并且尝试破坏此区域内属于你和盟友的物品。

升阶 （6环）　若被摧毁，这些隐形仆役会在第二天清晨重组。仪式开销增加至30gp。

entries.name: 隐形仆役 UNSEEN SERVANT
entries.description:
你召唤一个隐形仆役（见边栏），你可以通过维持该法术的一部分来命令它。

它会为你服务直到其生命值被减少到0，此时法术结束，或者直到你停止维持该法术。隐形仆役获得被召唤特征。

隐形仆役（UNSEEN SERVANT） 生物 –1

中型 无心智

察觉 +0；黑暗视觉

语言 —（理解其创造者）

技能 潜行 +8

力量 -4，敏捷 +2，体质 +0，智力 -5，感知 +0，魅力 +0

隐形 隐形仆役是隐形的，但它通常不会隐匿（Sneak），所以它通常只处于藏匿（hidden）。

AC 13；强韧 +0，反射 +4，意志 +0

HP 4；免疫 疾病，心灵，非魔法攻击，麻痹，毒素，精准，失去意识；抗力 所有伤害5（除了力场或者幽冥）

速度 飞行30尺

力场身躯 隐形仆役的身躯由力场组成。它无法使用攻击动作。它能够移动，以及使用交互动作来进行拿取物体、打开未堵上未上锁的门、拿着椅子、清洁等工作。它无法穿过固体。

entries.name: Untwisting Iron Buffer
entries.description:
You send currents of protective ki to the surface of your body that protect you from harm, at least until your enemies dissipate them. You gain 15 temporary Hit Points, which last for up to 3 rounds.

Heightened (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 5.

entries.name: Unusual Anatomy
entries.description:
You transform your flesh and organs into a bizarre amalgam of glistening skin, rough scales, tufts of hair, and tumorous protuberances. This has three effects:

  • You gain resistance 10 to precision damage and resistance 10 to extra damage from critical hits. If the resistance is greater than the extra damage, it reduces the extra damage to 0 but doesn't reduce the attack's normal damage.
  • You gain darkvision.
  • Acid oozes from your skin. Any creature that hits you with an unarmed attack or with a non-reach melee weapon takes 2d6 acid damage.

Heightened (+2) The resistances increase by 5, and the acid damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: 血族驱命 VAMPIRIC EXSANGUINATION
entries.description:
你伸出手臂，抽取其他生物的血液和生命力。

你对区域中的活物造成12d6负能量伤害。

你获得等于一个生物从该法术受到的伤害一半的临时生命值；计算该临时生命时，使用承受最多伤害的生物。你在1分钟后失去任何剩余的临时生命值。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加2d6。

entries.name: 鲜血铁棺 VAMPIRIC MAIDEN
entries.description:
虚幻的铁处女突然将目标困住，并吸取其生命力，以增益你的生命。

这会造成4d4穿刺伤害和4d4负能量伤害，目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免。你获得等于目标承受的负能量伤害的临时HP（在计算抗力，弱点和类似效果后）。在一分钟后，你会失去剩余的临时HP。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受一半伤害。

失败 目标被暂时困在鲜血铁棺中。目标承受完整伤害，并且被铁处女所禁足，持续1轮，或者直到它使用一个交互动作来脱身，以先发生为准。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且被铁处女所禁足，持续一轮，或者直到它逃脱（Escape），DC是你的法术DC，以先发生为准。

升阶（+1） 该穿刺伤害和负能量伤害各增加1d4。

entries.name: 吸血鬼之触 VAMPIRIC TOUCH
entries.description:
你的接触从目标身上抽出生命之血，以强化自身。

你获得等于目标承受的负能量伤害（在抗力及类似效果生效后）一半的临时生命值。你在1分钟后失去任何剩余的临时生命值。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加2d6。

entries.name: 隐匿之纱 VEIL
entries.description:
你将目标伪装为另一个身形相似身高相仿体重相近的生物。

该伪装能够隐藏目标的身份，或者令其如同其他族裔，但这不足以令其扮作另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变声音，气味，或者仪态。你为每个目标分别选择伪装；例如，你可以令一个目标看起来是矮人，另一个看起来是精灵。

施放隐匿之纱视为假扮（Impersonate）动作的设立伪装。这令目标忽视任何可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的罚值，并且会赋予其在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上其等级。你可以解消任一或者所有这些伪装。

升阶（5环级） 该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

升阶（7环级） 该目标外观上可以是任何相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须曾见过特定个人，才能重现其外观。该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

entries.name: Veil of Confidence
entries.description: You surround yourself in a veil of confidence. You reduce your current @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition by 1, and whenever you would become Frightened during the duration, reduce the amount by 1. If you critically fail a save against fear, veil of confidence ends immediately, and you increase any Frightened condition you gain from the critical failure by 1 instead of decreasing it.

entries.name: Veil of Dreams
entries.description:
You draw the target into a drowsy state, causing daydreams and sluggishness. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success: The target is unaffected.

Success: The target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception, attack rolls, and Will saves. This penalty increases to -2 for Will saves against sleep effects.

Failure: As success, and any time the target uses a concentrate action, it must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the action is disrupted.

entries.name: 腹语术 VENTRILOQUISM
entries.description:
当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出。

当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出，并且你可以随着你说话，自由改变该发声位置。任何听见该声音的生物可以尝试不相信的你的幻术。

升阶（2环级） 该法术时间增加到1小时，并且你也可以改变其语调，音质等声音属性。在生物尝试不相信你的幻术前，它必须主动尝试一次察觉检定，或者使用动作与声音交互。

entries.name: Verdant Sprout
entries.description:
You imbue a single ordinary, inexpensive plant seed with primal energy and throw it onto a surface, where it gradually sprouts into a Medium plant. After 10 minutes, the plant is sturdy enough to provide standard cover, and its space is difficult terrain. The plant is laden with nutritious nuts or fruit sufficient to feed one Medium creature for a day. The plant has AC 10, Hardness 5, and 20 Hit Points.

Heightened (+1) You throw an additional seed, which grows into an additional plant within range.

entries.name: 震荡图纹 VIBRANT PATTERN
entries.description:
你创造一个由剧烈跳动的光芒组成的图纹。

在图纹中的生物目眩。除此之外，在你施放时处于图纹中的生物，进入图纹中的生物，在图纹中结束回合的生物，或者对图纹使用搜索（Seek）或者交互动作的生物在此时必须尝试一次意志豁免。已经被图纹所目盲（blinded）的生物无需尝试新的豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 图纹令该生物目盲（blinded）。如果它离开了图纹，在它每个回合结束时，它可以尝试一次新的豁免，以从目盲（blinded）状态中回复，此处最大持续时间为1分钟。

大失败 该生物目盲（blinded），持续1分钟。

entries.name: Vibrant Thorns
entries.description:
Your body sprouts a coat of brambly thorns that harm those that strike you and thrive on life magic. Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that hit you with unarmed attacks, take 1 piercing damage each time they do. Anytime you cast a positive spell, the damage from your thorns increases to 1d6 until the start of your next turn.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1, or 1d6 after you cast a positive spell.

entries.name: Vigilant Eye
entries.description: You create an @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} eye sensor, as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Clairvoyance}. When created, this eye must be in your line of sight. When the spell's duration ends, you can spend 1 Focus Point as a free action to extend the duration for another hour, though as normal, it ends immediately during your next daily preparations.

entries.name: Vision of Weakness
entries.description: You focus your gaze on a creature and gain a flash of divine insight into its nature. If the creature has any weaknesses, you learn them, as well as which of its three saving throw modifiers is lowest. You also learn an inherent understanding of its movements and gain a +2 status bonus to your next attack roll (or skill check made as part of an attack action) against that foe before the end of your turn. The target is then temporarily immune to Vision of Weakness for 1 day.

entries.name: 大难临头 VISIONS OF DANGER
entries.description:
法术区域中充满可怕生物的幻影。

该生物看起来是超小型集群怪物，其外观由你指定，例如地狱苍蝇或者活化锯齿剑。在爆发区域被创造时进入区域中的，在爆发区域中结束回合的，以及在爆发区域中开始回合的每个生物受到8d8心灵伤害。在其意志豁免骰上大成功的生物可以立即尝试不相信该幻觉。与该怪物交互，或者通过搜索（Seek）动作观察该怪物的生物可以尝试不相信该幻术。不相信该幻术的生物在之后不会再因该幻术受到伤害。

升阶（+1） 该心灵伤害增加1d8。

entries.name: 活力信标 VITAL BEACON
entries.description:
生命力自你放射而出，其他人能够通过祈愿而获得治疗。

每轮一次，你或者一个盟友可以使用一个交互动作，可以通过用手接触你向你祈愿，并回复生命值。每当信标治愈某人后，其强度会减弱。它对第一个生物回复4d10生命值，第二个为4d8，第三个为4d6，第四个为4d4，这之后法术结束。你同时只能有一个活力信标。

升阶（+1） 该信标在治疗时额外回复一个骰子的生命值，使用和对应阶段的骰子相同的骰子。

entries.name: 火山爆发 VOLCANIC ERUPTION
entries.description:
地面裂开，滚动的熔岩喷薄而出。

形成的火柱对该区域中的生物造成14d6火焰伤害。该岩浆会快速冷却，并复盖区域中的生物。被岩石复盖中的生物获得笨拙1，并且在其速度上承受-10尺状态罚值。对于飞行生物，所有普通地形均为困难地形，并且这些生物会在被复盖时立即降低20尺，但他们不会因这次坠落承受伤害。被岩石复盖的生物可以尝试对抗你的法术DC以脱逃（Escape）来终止该效果。否则，该生物会一直被岩石复盖，直到承受累计50点伤害，使其从岩石中脱身。

除此之外，在该区域中的，以及距离岩浆柱5尺的生物会由于剧烈的热量承受3d6火焰伤害，无论豁免结果为何。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并被岩石复盖。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，并被岩石复盖。

升阶（+1） 区域中的伤害增加2d6，剧烈热量的伤害增加1d6。

entries.name: 喷吐虫群 VOMIT SWARM
entries.description:
你喷出一团魔法虫群。

你通过想象来吐出这些生物，这让你能改变这些生物的外观（通常是蜈蚣、蟑螂、黄蜂和蠕虫的混合体），但这不会改变法术的效果。虫群涌过区域中的每个人，其叮咬造成2d8穿刺伤害（基础反射豁免）。在豁免骰中失败的生物也会获得恶心1。当该法术结束时，虫群也会消失。

升阶（+1） 该伤害增加1d8。

entries.name: 女妖之嚎 WAIL OF THE BANSHEE
entries.description:
你的嘶嚎令敌人魂飞魄散。

在区域中的每个活着的敌人承受8d10负能量伤害，并且必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受完整伤害。

失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且获得流失1d4。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且获得流失4。

entries.name: Waking Nightmare
entries.description:
You fill the creature's mind with a terrifying vision out of its nightmares. The target must attempt a Will save. If the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} when you Cast this Spell on it, it immediately wakes up before attempting its save, and if it fails its save, it gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition for 1 round in addition to the effects noted above.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1.

Failure The target is Frightened 2.

Critical Failure The target is Frightened 3.

entries.name: 火墙术 WALL OF FIRE
entries.description:
你创造一面火焰墙壁，它会灼烧穿过它的生物。

你创造至多60尺长的10尺高5尺厚的直线型火焰墙壁，或者5尺厚，10尺半径10尺高环形火焰。该墙无论哪种形态均为竖直墙；如果你想的话，墙的高度可以更小。墙一侧的任何事物对于另一侧的生物而言均为隐蔽。任何穿过该墙或者在回合开始时占据墙的区域的生物承受4d6火焰伤害。

升阶（+1） 该火焰伤害增加1d6。

entries.name: 肉墙术 WALL OF FLESH
entries.description:
你创造一面20尺高，30尺长，直线型的由活肉构成的墙壁。

该墙壁有3英尺厚，每5尺长的墙具有AC10和75HP。如果你想的话，该墙壁的长度和高度可以更小。你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。该墙壁无法被修复（Repaired），但是可以通过正能量以及治疗法术和能力所治疗。

当你施放该法术时，为你的墙选择下列特性之一。

嘴 墙壁表面长满了布满尖牙的嘴。这些嘴会对距离墙壁5尺内结束回合的生物进行打击（Strike），对于这些打击使用你的法术攻击骰，造成等于1d6+你的施法属性调整值的穿刺伤害。这些嘴能够引用药水；只要墙壁还活着，它能够通过治疗药水（potion of healing）回复生命值，但是他无法从任何赋予其移动能力的效果中获得好处。除此之外，GM决定什么药水能够影响该墙壁。

眼 墙壁上张开无数不眨的眼睛。你可以通过这些眼镜视物，在墙壁视觉线内获得视觉察觉（Perception）检定上的+2环境加值。你也可以使用这些眼镜来决定远程攻击和法术的视觉线，但你的效果线无法穿过墙壁。

臂 墙壁由一团相互抓握的手臂组成。任何在墙壁5尺内结束回合的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 该生物被墙壁擒抱，持续1轮，或者直到对抗你的法术DC以逃脱（Escape），以先发生为准。

大失败 该生物被墙壁束缚，持续1轮，或者直到对抗你的法术DC以逃脱（Escape），以先发生为准。

entries.name: 力墙术 WALL OF FORCE
entries.description:
你创造一面由纯粹魔法力量构成的墙，它至多50尺长20尺高。

该墙没有可以计量的厚度。你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。该墙具有AC10，硬度30，以及60生命值，并且它免疫重击和精准伤害。物理效果无法穿透该墙壁，并且由于其由纯粹的力组成，他也会阻挡虚体（incorporeal）和灵体（ethereal）生物。传送效果和视觉效果（因为该墙是透明的）可以穿过该屏障。

力墙术免疫环级比其更低的反制效果，但是该墙会由于任何环级的解离术（disintegrate）、接触到抹消权杖（rod of cancellation）或者接触到毁灭黑洞（sphere of annihilation）而被摧毁。

升阶（+2） 该墙的生命值增加20。

entries.name: 冰墙术 WALL OF ICE
entries.description:
你构造一面由冰组成的屏障，它能阻挡视线，并且在被破坏后也能冻结敌人。

你创造至多60尺长的1尺厚10尺高冰墙（该墙壁无需是竖直的，但两边必须固定到固体表面上）或者1尺厚10尺半径的半球形。这面冰组成的墙壁是不透明的。如果你想的话，该墙壁的长度，高度，半径都可以更小。你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。

每一段10尺乘10尺的墙壁具有AC10，硬度10，以及40生命值，并且它免疫重击，寒冷伤害，以及精准伤害。这样的一段墙也具有对火焰弱点15；被火焰摧毁的墙壁会融化或升华，变为水和蒸气。一段被其他方法摧毁的墙会留下一团寒冷的冰块，它是困难地形，并且会对穿过的生物造成2d6寒冷伤害。升阶（+2） 每一段墙的生命值增加10，并且对穿过被摧毁部分生物造成的寒冷伤害增加1d6。

entries.name: 石墙术 WALL OF STONE
entries.description:
你塑造一面岩石墙壁。

你创造一个至多120尺长，20尺高1英寸厚的石墙。你可以塑形石墙的路径，将墙壁的每5尺放在方格之间的边界上。该墙壁无需竖直，所以举例而言，你可以用其塑造一座桥，或者一组阶梯。你必须将该墙创造在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。

每一段5尺乘5尺的墙壁具有AC10，硬度14，以及50生命值，并且它免疫重击，寒冷伤害，以及精准伤害。一段被摧毁的墙壁可以移动通过，但是因此留下的碎石会令其变成困难地形。

升阶（+2） 每一段墙的生命值增加15。

entries.name: 棘墙术 WALL OF THORNS
entries.description:
你令地面上在一分钟的时间里不断长出茂密而长满尖刺的灌木。

你创造一个至多120尺长，10尺高5尺厚的灌木墙。你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。该墙为竖直的。如果你想的话，该墙壁的长度，高度都可以更小。墙一侧的任何事物对于另一侧的生物而言均具有掩蔽（cover）。每当生物使用一个动作进入至少一个墙壁所处空间中时，该生物承受3d4穿刺伤害。

每一段5尺乘5尺的墙壁具有AC10，硬度10，以及20生命值。它免疫重击和精准伤害。一段被摧毁的墙壁可以随意移动通过。

升阶（+1） 每一段墙的生命值增加5，并且该穿刺伤害增加1d4。

entries.name: 风墙术 WALL OF WIND
entries.description:
你创造一层会干扰所有通过事物的暴风墙。

这面由旋风组成的墙有5尺厚，60尺长，30尺高。该墙为竖直的，但你可以指定其形态。虽然风墙会搅动空气，但不会阻碍视觉。该墙壁具有下列效果。

来自物理远程攻击的弹药（例如箭，矢，投石索弹丸，以及其他类似大小的物体）无法穿过该墙。更大的远程武器的攻击，例如标枪，如果其路线通过该墙壁，则其在攻击骰上承受-2环境罚值。重型远程武器和不创造实体物体的法术效果可以不受罚值地通过该墙。

该墙对尝试从地面通过它的生物为困难地形。气体，以及处于气体的生物，无法穿过墙壁。

尝试通过移动动作飞过墙壁的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 该生物本回合可以正常移动穿过该墙。

成功 该飞行生物本回合可以正常移动穿过该墙，但是该墙为困难地形。

失败 该墙阻挡飞行生物的移动，并且当前动作的剩余移动力被浪费。

大失败 如同失败，并且该生物会被推离该墙10尺。

entries.name: Wanderer's Guide
entries.description: You call upon the beyond to guide your route. When you Cast this Spell, choose a destination; you receive an inspired route to that destination, allowing you and allies who travel overland with you to reduce the movement penalty from difficult terrain by half for the duration, as long as you don't deviate from the inspired route. This doesn't have any effect on movement during encounters. If you use this ability again before the duration is over, this effect ends and is replaced by that of the new route.

entries.name: 守护结界 Ward Domain
entries.description:
描述 该仪式被用于长期保护强权统治者、施法者或其他重要人物的私人密室。你与其他施法者会用施法时间来燃烧焚香、在门框上涂抹油膏和在入口用银粉划线。该仪式会在区域内创造后述魔法效果；这些法术会被升阶至仪式的环级，且在仪式的持续时间中维持生效。

所有区域内的关口（gates）、门扉（doors）、窗户（windows）以及类似的开口（若有的话）都会被锁上，具有固锁术（lock）的效果。此外，你可以掩盖区域内至多6道门扉（doors）、门廊（doorways）或类似的入口，用幻象造物（illusory object）的效果让它们看起来像是普通的墙壁一般。探知（Scrying）法术无法从该区域感受到任何刺激（any stimuli），而且守护结界会尝试阻止传送效果进入或离开该区域，这包括试图召唤生物进入该区域，使用的调整值等同于仪式的豁免DC - 10点。

对某个特定效果成功使用解除魔法仅能移除对应效果（比如某一扇窗户的固锁术效果）。成功的裂解术（disjunction）能够终止整个仪式。

大成功 你成功创造了上述效果，而且你保护的区域大小为原本的两倍。

成功 你成功创造了上述效果。

失败 仪式没有任何效果。

大失败 整片区域以你无法预料到的方式变得机关重重，而且对你和你的盟友充满敌意。

升阶 （+1）　守护结界会额外复盖一片100尺 x 100尺、至多50尺高的区域，这片新增区域必须与最初的仪式区域相邻。

entries.name: 心灵扭曲 WARP MIND
entries.description:
你操控一个生物的精神弱点和感官输入。

目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。无论豁免结果如何，该目标之后会暂时免疫10分钟。心灵扭曲的效果是立即的，所以解除魔法（dispel magic）或者其他反制法术的效果无法反制其效果。但是，扭转现实（alter reality），奇迹术（miracle），荒古奇观（primal phenomenon），复原术（restoration），或者祈愿术（wish）仍能反制这些效果。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标按照困惑（confused）状态使用其下个回合的第一个动作。

失败 目标获得困惑（confused）1分钟。

大失败 目标永久困惑（confused）。

entries.name: Warped Terrain
entries.description:
You create illusory hazards that cover all surfaces in the area (typically the ground). Any creature moving through the illusion treats the squares as difficult terrain. A creature can attempt to disbelieve the effect as normal after using a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action or otherwise spending actions interacting with the illusion. If it successfully disbelieves, it ignores the effect for the remaining duration. For each additional action you use casting the spell, the burst's radius increases by 5 feet, to a maximum of 10 extra feet for 3 actions.

Heightened (4th) You can make the illusion appear in the air rather than on a surface, causing it to function as difficult terrain for flying creatures.

entries.name: 水中呼吸 WATER BREATHING
entries.description:
目标可以在水中呼吸。

目标可以在水中呼吸。

升阶（3环级） 该持续时间增加到8小时。

升阶（4环级） 该持续时间增加到直到你的下次每日准备。

entries.name: 水面行走 WATER WALK
entries.description:
目标能在水面以及其他液体表面行走，且不会坠入其中。

目标能在水面以及其他液体表面行走，且不会坠入其中。如果它想，也可以进入水中，但此时它必须如常游泳（Swim）。该法术不会赋予在水中呼吸的能力。

升阶（4环级） 该法术的射程增加到30尺，持续时间增加到1小时，并且你能以至多10个生物为目标。

entries.name: Weapon of Judgement
entries.description:
An immense weapon of force appears, hovering in the air above the target. The weapon has the ghostly visual appearance of your deity's favored weapon. Name war or peace when you cast this spell.

If you name "war," mentally choose one creature. This must be a creature both you and the target can see. The target instinctively knows which creature this is. At the end of each of the target's turns, if the target did not use a hostile action against the creature you chose during that turn, the weapon Strikes the target.

If you name "peace," mentally choose up to five allies. The target instinctively knows who those allies are. The weapon Strikes the target each time the target uses a hostile action against you or one of your allies. The weapon Strikes only once per action, even if the action targets multiple allies (such as for a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} or a Whirlwind Strike).

Strikes with the weapon are melee weapon attacks, but they use your spell attack modifier. Regardless of its appearance, the weapon deals force damage equal to 3d10 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. The weapon takes a multiple attack penalty, which increases throughout the target's turn, but its penalty is separate from yours.

When the weapon Strikes, you can deal damage of the normal damage type of the weapon instead of force damage (or any of the available damage types, for a versatile weapon). No other statistics or attributes of the weapon apply, and even a ranged weapon attacks adjacent creatures only. A weapon of judgment is a weapon for the purposes of triggers, resistances, and so forth.

The weapon doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. The weapon can't make any attack other than its Strike, and feats or spells that affect weapons do not apply to this weapon.

Heightened (10th) The force damage increases by 1d10.
