entries.name: 武器风暴 WEAPON STORM
entries.description:
你挥动你正持握的武器，这把武器会产生无数复制，攻击所有在锥形或者弥漫区域中的生物。

此狂风会对区域中的每个生物造成四个伤害骰的伤害。该伤害具有和该物体相同的类型，并且使用相同的骰子。在决定骰子时，视同你正用该武器攻击；例如，如果你正双手持用一把双手武器，你使用其双手伤害骰。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 目标承受一半伤害。

失败 目标承受完整伤害。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且会受到武器重击专精效果。

升阶（+1） 增加一个伤害骰。

entries.name: Weapon Surge
entries.description: Holding your weapon aloft, you fill it with divine energy. On your next Strike with that weapon before the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll and the weapon deals an additional die of damage. If the weapon has a striking rune, this instead increases the number of dice from the striking rune by 1 (to a maximum of 3 extra weapon dice).If the target weapon leaves your possession, weapon surge immediately ends.

entries.name: 蛛网术 WEB
entries.description:
你在目标区域中创造了一片会在生物穿过时阻碍其移动的蛛网。

充满蛛网的方格是困难地形。每一格蛛网可以通过一个动作、造成5点挥砍伤害、或者1点火焰伤害来清楚。一格具有AC5，并且它在豁免骰上自动失败。

每当蛛网中的一个生物使用移动动作、或者在移动动作中进入蛛网，它必须尝试一次对抗你的法术DC的运动（Athletics）检定或者反射豁免，否则会在其速度上承受环境罚值甚至被禁足。离开蛛网的生物不再承受来自蛛网的速度环境罚值。

大成功 该生物不受影响，并且它本轮无需继续尝试对抗蛛网的运动（Athletics）检定或者豁免骰。如果它使用运动检定，对于其离开的每个格子后，它会清理掉该格子中的所有蛛网。

成功 该生物在其动作中不受影响。如果它使用运动检定，对于其离开的每个格子后，它会清理掉该格子中的所有蛛网。

失败 该生物在速度上承受-10尺环境罚值，直到其下个回合开始。

大失败 该生物被禁足，直到其下个回合开始，之后它在速度上承受-10尺环境罚值，持续1轮。他可以尝试逃脱（Escape）来移除其禁足状态。

升阶（4环级） 该法术区域增加为20尺爆发，并且其射程增加到60尺。

entries.name: 怪影杀手 WEIRD
entries.description:
你用源自目标最深恐惧的惊骇怪形的影像填满目标的意识。

只有目标能看见攻击它的怪形。每个目标承受16d6心灵伤害，并且必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受一半伤害，并且获得惊惧1。

失败 目标承受完整伤害，并且获得惊惧2。

大失败 目标被惊吓的几乎要立即死去。它必须尝试一次强韧豁免骰。如果该目标成功，他承受双倍伤害，并且获得惊惧2，并且除非它大成功，它也会逃逸直到其下一轮结束。如果它失败，它降低到0生命值并且死亡。

entries.name: Whirling Flames
entries.description:
You call forth a storm of whirling flames, engulfing all creatures in that area and dealing [[/r 5d6 #fire]] fire damage with a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by [[/r 3d6 #fire]], and you can add another non-overlapping 5-foot burst to the area.

entries.name: 回旋围巾
entries.description:
You surround yourself in a vortex of whirling colorful scarves of force that obfuscate you and disorient your foes. You gain the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, but only against ranged and melee attacks. When a melee attack fails to hit you because of the flat check for the Concealed condition, the scarves snag the weapon or unarmed attack, and the creature takes a -1 circumstance penalty to further attacks with that weapon or unarmed attack until the end of its turn (or the end of its next turn, if it wasn't the creature's turn). The timing of the scarves' movement is harder to predict for ranged attackers, so the flat check for the Concealed condition against ranged attacks increases from DC 5 to DC 6. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (+2) The circumstance penalty to further attacks with a melee weapon or unarmed attack the scarves snag increases by 1. The DC of the flat check for the Concealed condition against ranged attacks increases by 1.

entries.name: Wholeness of Body
entries.description:
You heal yourself in one of the following ways, chosen by you when you cast the spell.

  • You regain 8 Hit Points.
  • You attempt to cure one poison or disease afflicting you; attempt to counteract the affliction.

Heightened (+1) If you choose to regain Hit Points, the Hit Points regained increase by 8.

entries.name: Wild Morph
entries.description:
You morph your body based on your training, choosing one of the following effects based on your wild order feats.

  • If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VaIHQzOE5ibmbtqU]{Wild Shape}, you can morph your hands into wild claws. Your hands transform into incredibly sharp claws. These claws are an unarmed attack you're trained in and deal 1d6 slashing damage each (agile, finesse). You can still hold and use items with your hands while they're transformed by this spell, but you cannot hold an item while attacking. If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OWedlrKGsVZVkSnT]{Insect Shape}, you can instead transform your mouth into wild jaws, an unarmed attack you're trained in that deals 1d8 piercing damage.
  • If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.F0MYBfiyOD8YHq5t]{Elemental Shape}, you can morph your body to be partially composed of elemental matter, granting you resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage.
  • If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.I9rSWQyueWHQyNxe]{Plant Shape}, you can morph your arms into long vines, increasing your reach to 10 feet (or 15 feet with a reach weapon).
  • If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wNHUryoRzlfDCFAd]{Soaring Shape}, you can cast the spell as a two-action activity (D somatic, verbal) to grow wings from your back. These wings allow you to fly with a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Heightened (6th) You can choose up to two of the effects from the list. Wild claws leave terrible, ragged wounds that also deal 2d6 persistent bleed damage on a hit, and wild jaws are envenomed, also dealing 2d6 persistent poison damage on a hit.

Heightened (10th) You can choose up to three of the effects from the list. Wild claws deal 4d6 persistent bleed damage on a hit, and wild jaws deal 4d6 persistent poison damage on a hit.

entries.name: Wild Shape
entries.description:
You infuse yourself with primal essence and transform yourself into another form. You can polymorph into any form listed in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}, which lasts 10 minutes. All other wild shape forms last 1 minute. You can add more forms to your wild shape list with druid feats; your feat might grant you some or all of the forms from a given polymorph spell. When you transform into a form granted by a spell, you gain all the effects of the form you chose from a version of the spell heightened to wild shape's level. Wild shape allows you to use your own shapeshifting training more easily than most polymorph spells. When you choose to use your own attack modifier while polymorphed instead of the form's default attack modifier, you gain a +2 status bonus to your attack rolls.

Heightened (2nd) You can also wild shape into the forms listed in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}.

entries.name: Wild Winds Stance
entries.description:
You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance. You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

entries.name: Wilding Word
entries.description:
With a few words, you convince a wild creature you are a kindred spirit, making it reluctant to harm you. The target must attempt a Will save. Regardless of the outcome, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success: The target is unaffected.

Success: When the target attempts an attack roll or skill check that would harm you, it takes a -2 status penalty to its roll.

Failure: As success, but the target also becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1 each time it damages you.

Critical Failure: As success, but the target also becomes sickened 2 each time it damages you.

entries.name: Wind Jump
entries.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.

Heightened (6th) At the end of your turn, you can attempt a DC 30 Acrobatics check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

entries.name: 御风而行 WIND WALK
entries.description:
当你施放该法术时，每个目标会转变成模糊的云团，并且被风按你指定的方向卷走。

你可以使用一个具有专注特征的动作改变风的方向。这股风会以20英里每小时的速度携卷目标移动，但如果目标进行一次攻击，施放一个法术，被攻击，或者进入遭遇模式，该法术在他们骰先攻后对于所有目标结束，他们会换换地飘落到地面上。

entries.name: Winter Bolt
entries.description:
You fling a hollow icicle filled with winter's wrath. Make a spell attack against a target within range. The bolt deals 1d8 piercing damage and lodges in the target. At the end of the target's next turn, the bolt shatters, releasing a whirl of snow and ice that deals 1d12 cold damage to the target and all adjacent creatures. The bolt can be removed with an Interact action, which causes it to melt harmlessly without detonating.

Critical Success The initial bolt deals full damage and is especially well anchored, taking 2 Interact actions to remove. The bolt's explosion deals double damage.

Success The bolt and its explosion deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The initial damage increases by 1d8 and the secondary damage increases by 1d12.

entries.name: 祈愿术 WISH
entries.description:
你念出愿望，令你最大的愿望成真。

一次施放祈愿术可以达成下列效果。

复制任何9环级或者更低的奥术法术。

复制任何7环级或者更低的非奥术法术。

产生任何效果与上述效果相当的效果。

逆转提到祈愿术（Wish）的效果。

GM可能会允许你尝试使用祈愿术来产生比这些更强的效果，但是这可能非常危险，或者该法术可能只会部分生效。

entries.name: Wish-Twisted Form
entries.description:
You focus your magic upon an enemy, wishing for their defenses to fail and turning their strengths into weaknesses. The target must attempt one Will saving throw for all of the following effects.

• The target gains weakness 5 to one energy type of your choice.
• The target's resistances are reduced by 5.
• The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds.
• The target takes a -1 status penalty to its saving throws.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes the penalties for 1 round.

Failure The target takes the penalties for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for the duration.

Heightened (+1) Increase the weakness and the reduction to resistances by 1.

entries.name: Withering Grasp
entries.description:
Your touch rots organic material and decays objects. Make a melee spell attack roll. Your touch deals 1d12 negative damage plus 1d4 persistent negative damage. If a creature uses an item to block withering grasp, such as with the Shield Block reaction, the item is automatically affected, but the creature does not take damage (even if there is damage left over after the shield's Hardness). Unlike normal negative damage, the negative damage from withering grasp damages objects, constructs, and the like by eroding them away.

Critical Success Your touch deals double damage (both initial and persistent). If you target an object, lower its Hardness by 4 for 1 minute.

Success Your touch deals full damage. If you target an object, lower its Hardness by 2 for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12 and the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} increases by 1. If you target an object, lower its Hardness by an additional 1 point on both a success and a critical success.

entries.name: Word of Freedom
entries.description:
You utter a liberating word of power that frees a creature. You suppress one of the following conditions of your choice: @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}. The target isn't affected by the chosen condition, and if you suppress the Grabbed condition, the target automatically breaks free from any grab affecting it when you Cast the Spell.

If you don't remove the effect that provided the condition, the condition returns after the spell ends. For example, if a spell was making the target Confused for 1 minute, word of freedom would let the target act normally for a round, but the Confused condition would return afterward.

entries.name: 回返真言 Word of Recall
entries.description:
描述 你把自己和盟友与特定的安全地点绑定在一起，这里被你用来执行仪式。该仪式允许所有参与者在之后通过简单地说出关键词的方式来返回此地。

成功 你与指定的避难所形成了一种联系。任何仪式中的参与者都能花费1个具有专注特征的动作，并以此来说出你在施放仪式时选择的真言。当他们这么做时，所有参与者都能够立即从任何位置返回到避难所，只要他们此时与避难所处于同一个位面就行。每个参与者都会返回到施放仪式期间自己所站的位置。在真言被说出时，每个参与者都会知晓这一点，而且每人都能选择是否在此刻返回到避难所。之后该仪式会立即结束。

失败 你没能在参与者和避难所之间构筑联系，并且可以意识到仪式失败了。

大失败 仪式在无意间与其他位面的某个地点构筑了联系。施法者没意识到这个错误。在说出真言后，所有仪式的参与者都会被传送到这个跨位面地点。

升阶 （+1）　开销增加5000gp，仪式的目标可以增加1个生物，并且可以作为仪式目标的最高等级增加2级。

entries.name: Word of Truth
entries.description: You speak a statement you believe to be true and that is free of any attempt to deceive through twisting words, omission, and so on. The statement must be 25 words or fewer. A symbol of your deity glows above your head, and anyone who sees you and hears your statement knows that you believe it to be true. Each time you Sustain this Spell, you can repeat this effect.

entries.name: Wyvern Sting
entries.description:
You duplicate the venomous sting of a wyvern. You deal [[/r 3d4 #piercing]] piercing damage to the touched creature and afflict it with wyvern venom. If the target takes piercing damage, they must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes [[/r 5d6 #poison]] poison damage.

Failure The target is afflicted with Wyvern Venom at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with wyvern venom at stage 2.

Wyvern Venom (poison) Level 9

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 5d6 #poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 6d6 #poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 8d6 #poison]] poison damage (1 round)

entries.name: You're Mine
entries.description:
You manipulate the target's emotions, potentially allowing you to control it for a brief instant. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} 1.

Failure On the target's next turn, it's Stunned 1 and you partially control it, causing it to take a single action of your choice. If it has actions left, it can act normally.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} for 1 round.

Heightened (7th) On a failure, the target is Controlled for 1 round. On a critical failure, the target is Controlled for up to 1 minute; it receives a new Will save at the end of each of its turns, and on a success, the spell ends.

entries.name: Zeal for Battle
entries.description:
Trigger You and at least 1 ally are about to roll initiative.

You stoke the righteous anger within yourself and an ally. You and the target ally each roll a d20 and use the higher result for both your initiative rolls. You each still use your own Perception modifier or other statistic to determine your results.

entries.name: 狂热执念 ZEALOUS CONVICTION
entries.description:
你绕过目标的理智思考，给他们灌输坚定的信念和狂热。

由于其信念近乎复盖了其身躯和心灵的功能，每个目标获得12临时生命值，在对抗心灵效果的意志豁免上获得+2状态加值。如果你指示一个目标去做某事，它必须遵从你的请求，即使其通常会反感这任务，由于这种认知失调，它能在每轮其回合结束时尝试一次意志豁免。在成功时，该法术对其的效果完全结束。

升阶（9环级） 该临时生命值增加到18，对意志豁免的状态加值增加到+3。

entries.name: Zenith Star
entries.description:
You call a tiny star to orbit a creature in a sparkling halo before shooting up into the heavens, where it marks the creature's rough location. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The target is Dazzled for 1 round. While the spell persists, as long as you can see the night sky and the target is visible from the same night sky, you can sense the approximate direction and distance to the creature by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This is exact enough to track the creature, but not pinpoint their exact square (for instance, to make an attack). You can set a number of zenith stars equal to your Wisdom modifier; if you exceed this number, your oldest zenith star is automatically Dismissed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Heightened (+1) The duration increases by 1 day.

Heightened (4th) You ignore the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} against targets marked by zenith star.

entries.name: 诚实之域 ZONE OF TRUTH
entries.description:
你指定一个区域，此区域中生物被迫只能说出真话。

处于区域中或者进入区域中的生物难以撒谎。每个会被影响的生物必须在法术被施放时、或者它第一次进入该区域时，尝试一次意志豁免。如果它离开并再次进入该区域，它会使用相同的豁免结果。受影响的生物会知晓此惑控效果的存在；因此，他们会避免回答那些他们通常以撒谎来回应的问题，或者在说真话的范围内闪烁其词。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标在欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-2状态罚值。

失败 该目标无法说出任何故意的谎言，并且在欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-2状态罚值。

大失败 该目标无法说出任何故意的谎言，并且在欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-4状态罚值。
